column2: A cultural shift has begun which has led to families no longer being as large as they once were. Having many children, in order to see them live to adulthood and carry on tradition, is no longer considered the norm. It is, however, still considered important for families to have as many children as they can afford.
column3: A cultural shift has begun which has led to families no longer being as large as they once were. Having many children, in order to see them live to adulthood and carry on tradition, is no longer considered the norm. column2: The 'Megali Idea', the Great Idea, was an irredentist conception of a Greater Greek state encompassing all ethnic Greeks, including in particular the substantial Greek minorities living on the Western Coast of Asia Minor. The concept was a driving force between much of Greece's interactions with the fading Ottoman state during the 19th century, and the goals of the Great Idea came very close to a realization in the Treaty of Sèvres, signed at the end of World War One. The vast land gains that the Treaty of Sèvres accorded to Greece were however largely undone by the following Greco-Turkish war of 1919-21. Big is beautiful!
column3: Lidée « Megali », la grande idée, est une conception irrédentiste dune Grande Nation grecque qui rassemblerait tous les peuples dethnie grecque, en particulier la substantielle minorité vivant sur la côte occidentale de lAsie mineure. Cette idée motiva la plupart des interactions de la Grèce avec l'Empire ottoman agonisant au cours du XIXe siècle et l'objectif de création d'une Grande Grèce fut bien près d'être atteint lors de la signature du Traité de Sèvre, à la fin de la Première guerre mondiale. Les vastes portions de territoire que le Traité de Sèvre accorda à la Grèce, furent largement perdues dans la guerre gréco-turque qui suivit entre 1919-1921. Big is beautiful !

column2: After an exhaustive study of western democratic methods, japanese scholars have settled on a method of government where the Emperor will preside over an Imperial Diet, elected by the people and yet preserving both Imperial power as well as our traditions. This, they believe, is the best way for Japan to move forward into the modern era.
column3: After an exhaustive study of western democratic methods, japanese scholars have settled on a method of government where the Emperor will preside over an Imperial Diet, elected by the people and yet preserving both Imperial power as well as our traditions. This, they believe, is the best way for Japan to move forward into the modern era.

column2: Progress in the name of the Emperor!
column3: Le progrès au nom de l'Empereur !

column2: Banking has grown to be a large business, one that has spawned an entire industry based on financial services for both our own people as well as those abroad.
column3: Banking has grown to be a large business, one that has spawned an entire industry based on financial services for both our own people as well as those abroad.

column2: Birth and blood had always been an unbearable limit for the ambitions of the bourgeoisie. For them, logically, men with talents and merits should be promoted. However, the privileges of the old aristocracy keep the commoners into inferior stratas, as only nobility of birth and tradition would be the sole determinant of the fittest of men.
column3: La naissance et le sang ont toujours été des limites insupportables pour les ambitions de la bourgeoisie. Pour eux, logiquement, les hommes avec des talents et des mérites devraient être encouragés. Toutefois, les privilèges de l'ancienne aristocratie gardent les roturiers en strates inférieures, pour eux seule la noblesse de naissance et de tradition, serait le seul facteur déterminant des plus aptes des hommes.

column2: This area involves the development and refinement of metal and minerals. Different techniques of cleaning, roasting, grinding and smelting decreased the losses of resources that had often occurred earlier.
column3: Ce domaine concerne le développement et le perfectionnement des métaux et minerais. On a diminué les pertes en matière première, jadis fréquentes, grâce à des techniques différentes de lavage, de calcination, de broyage et de fusion.

column2: The development of isoprene will allow our rubber plants to produce better forms of artificial rubber, perhaps even making rubber that is far preferable to the real thing.
column3: The development of isoprene will allow our rubber plants to produce better forms of artificial rubber, perhaps even making rubber that is far preferable to the real thing.

column2: The Microclimate Cooling System, built into the Life Critical Layer, would have been a network of narrow tubing to provide heating or cooling to the soldier, up to 100 watts.
column3: The Microclimate Cooling System, built into the Life Critical Layer, would have been a network of narrow tubing to provide heating or cooling to the soldier, up to 100 watts.

column2: Military aviation is the use of aircraft and other flying machines for the purposes of conducting or enabling warfare. Heavier-than-air aircraft were recognized as having military applications early on. A Wright Model A was purchased in 1909 by the U.S. Army Signal Corps, and in 1911 the Italians used a variety of aircraft types in reconnaissance, photo-reconnaissance, and bombing roles as part of the Italo-Turkish War. World War I saw military aviation rapidly embrace many specialized types, such as scouts, artillery observers, fighters or bombers.
column3: L'aviation militaire est l'utilisation d'avions ainsi que d'autres engins volants pour la réalisation ou permettant la guerre. Des aéronef plus lourds que l'air ont été reconnus comme ayant des applications militaires dès le début. Un modèle  Wright à été acheté en 1909  par l'US Army Signal Corps et, en 1911, les Italiens ont utilisé différents types d'avions pour la reconnaissance et comme bombardier dans le cadre de la guerre Italo-Turque. Durant la Première Guerre Mondiale, l'aviation militaire à rapidement embrassé plusieurs spécialités comme la reconnaissance, l'observation d'artillerie, le combat et le bombardement.

column2: Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with, and all the world will know it!
column3: Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with, and all the world will know it!

column2: In wartime an influential Navy that had lobbied for their cause for a long time could get full control not only over the execution of the war, but also over the resource management of the country. This could basically be called a Military Dictatorship governed by the Admiralty.
column3: En temps de guerre, une influente marine qui fait fait pression depuis une longue période, peut avoir le contrôle complet non seulement sur l'exécution de la guerre, mais aussi sur la gestion des ressources du pays. Cela pourrait en fait être appelé une dictature militaire régie par l'amirauté.

column2: Military psychology is the research, design and application of psychological theories and experimentation data towards understanding, predicting and countering behaviours either in friendly or enemy forces or civilian populations that may be undesirable, threatening or potentially dangerous to the conduct of military operations. Military psychology is applied towards counseling and treatment of stress and fatigue of military personnel or military families as well as treatment of psychological trauma suffered as a result of military operations.

Military psychology is applied towards counseling and treatment of stress and fatigue of military personnel or military families as well as treatment of psychological trauma suffered as a result of military operations.

column2: With its campus located in scenic Arkham, beside the darkly muttering Miskatonic River, in beautiful Essex County, Miskatonic University is one of New England's most renowned institutions of higher learning. Well known for its collection of unique and vast collection of books on the ancient and the occult, Miskatonic University sports, among others, fragments of the fabled Book of Eibon, and an original copy of Friedrich von Junzt's standard work 'Unaussprechlichen Kulten'.
column3: Avec son campus situé dans la jolie localité d'Arkham, près de la sombre rivière Miskatonic, luniversité de Miskatonic est une des institutions détudes supérieures les plus renommées de la Nouvelle-Angleterre. Connue pour sa collection unique et imposante de livres anciens et occultes, l'université de Miskatonic possède, entre autre, des fragments du célèbre Livre d'Eibon et une copie originale de l'ouvrage de Friedrich von Juntz, « Unaussprechlichen Kulten ».

column2: This was the idea that what was defined as the uncivilized world needed to be civilized and that its inhabitants were like children who needed to be enlightened by a fair but harsh hand. This was the ideology that led and justified the colonialization and occupation done by the Great Powers.
column3: Telle était l'idée que ce qui était défini comme le monde non civilisé devait être civilisé et que ses habitants étaient comme des enfants qui avaient besoin d'être éclairé par une main juste mais sévère. Ce fut l'idéologie qui mena et justifia la colonisation et l'occupation par les Grandes Puissances.

column2: As the twentieth century developed and the influence of alternative models of economic development outside the capitalist framework began to be implemented in certain societies, some politicians began to consider the possibility that merging what were considered the best elements from both capitalism and command economies could produce benefits for their society as a whole. As a result in some nations moves were made by the State to introduce elements of state direction into certain areas of economic activity while preserving the basic capitalist elements at the root of the economic system. While many more ideologically-driven critics of such policies argued the policies either went too far or not far enough in their transformations of the economy, the results of creating a mixed economic system in terms of both restoring economic production and reducing social tensions were often quite impressive.
column3: As the twentieth century developed and the influence of alternative models of economic development outside the capitalist framework began to be implemented in certain societies, some politicians began to consider the possibility that merging what were considered the best elements from both capitalism and command economies could produce benefits for their society as a whole. As a result in some nations moves were made by the State to introduce elements of state direction into certain areas of economic activity while preserving the basic capitalist elements at the root of the economic system. While many more ideologically-driven critics of such policies argued the policies either went too far or not far enough in their transformations of the economy, the results of creating a mixed economic system in terms of both restoring economic production and reducing social tensions were often quite impressive.

column2: By pre-planning mobilization, all reserve units had set mobilization areas and time tables for getting equipment, boarding trains, and frontal marching routes. This sped up the mobilization vastly.
column3: La préparation de la mobilisation a permis d'établir, pour les unités de réserve, des lieux précis de rassemblement, des horaires de chargement des trains de matériel et des ordres de marche vers le front. Cela a accéléré considérablement la mobilisation.

column2: The modern armaments industry saw impressive gains in arms production.
column3: The modern armaments industry saw impressive gains in arms production.

column2: Battlecruiser design underwent a brief renaissance in the 1930s as several naval powers built new battlecruisers designed either to raid enemy shipping or to hunt down and sink enemy commerce raiders. Better armour protection was achieved without a significant reduction in speed, and presaged the future development of the fast battleship.
column3: La conception des croiseurs de bataille a eu une renaissance brève dans les années 1930 ou plusieurs puissances navales construisirent de nouveaux croiseurs conçus, soit pour effectuer des opérations de raids sur les navires ennemis soit pour traquer et couler les commerce-raiders (navires marchands militarisés sous un camouflage). La meilleure protection blindée a été atteinte sans une réduction significative de la vitesse, et présageait le développement futur du cuirassé rapide.

column2: A new generation of battleships was designed in the 1930s, which included improved armament, particularly with respect to anti-aircraft armament, enhanced armour protection, and an increased speed of on average 28 knots.
column3: Dans les années 1930, une nouvelle génération de cuirassés a vu le jour avec notamment des améliorations en termes d'armement, antiaérien plus particulièrement, de blindage et de vitesse (28 nuds en moyenne).

column2: Further refinements of cruiser design in the interwar period including increases in armour and in the number of guns, both main and anti-aircraft armament.
column3: La période de l'entre-deux-guerres permit d'améliorer encore les croiseurs en termes de blindage et d'armement, principal et antiaérien à la fois.

column2: With the rise of modern industrial practices and the increasing availability of new materials for construction purposes, a new school of architecture and design would evolve in the early twentieth century that would mark a radical break with the definitions of style of the past. Following upon the dictum Form Follows Function, a new focus in architechture and design based around clean lines, verticality and a deliberate lack of orientation would come to the fore in the work of architects such as Louis Henri Sullivan, Frank Lloyd Wright, Walter Gropius and Le Courboisier and in schools of design such as the Bauhaus
column3: Avec la montée des pratiques industrielles modernes et la disponibilité croissante de nouveaux matériaux pour la construction, une nouvelle école d'architecture et du design évolue au début du XXe siècle qui marquera une rupture radicale avec les définitions du style du passé. Avec la maxime de « la forme suit la fonction », une orientation nouvelle de l'architecture et du design basée sur des lignes épurées, la verticalité et l'absence délibérée d'orientation est passée au premier plan dans le travail d'architectes comme Louis Henri Sullivan, Frank Lloyd Wright, Walter Écoles Gropius et Le Courboisier et dans les écoles de design tels que le Bauhaus.

column2: The late interwar period saw destroyers increase in size as well as the number of roles they could fulfill, including countering the increasing threat from aircraft, with the introduction of specific anti-aircraft armament.
column3: À la fin de l'entre-deux-guerres, les destroyers étaient plus imposants encore et pouvaient remplir davantage de missions, pour contrer notamment la menace croissante de l'aviation, moyennant l'ajout d'un arsenal antiaérien spécifique.

column2: Many of those philosophers belonging in some sense to the area of Analytic Philosophy were also those who revolutionized logics. Others where famous mathematicians who as they delved into the fundaments of mathematics developed ideas that were as important for logics as mathematics.
column3: Beaucoup de ces philosophes appartenant en quelque sorte à la zone de la philosophie analytique sont aussi ceux qui ont révolutionné les logiques. Et autres célèbres mathématiciens qui, ont puisé dans les fondements des mathématiques développant des idées qui ont été aussi importantes pour la logique que pour les mathématiques.

column3: The best weapons foreign nations have to offer

column2: We now possess the ability to build factories that can create the most complex and modern furniture possible, feeding the demand for such luxuries among the wealthy.
column3: We now possess the ability to build factories that can create the most complex and modern furniture possible, feeding the demand for such luxuries among the wealthy.

column2: The Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment it's the current generation of load-bearing equipment and rucksacks. The system's modularity is derived from the use of PALS webbing, rows of heavy-duty nylon stitched onto the vest as to allow for attachment of various MDALE-compatible pouches and accessories. This method of attachment has become a de facto standard for modular tactical gear, replacing the A.L.I.C.E system used in the earliest modular vest systems (which is still in use with most Western police departments).
column3: The Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment it's the current generation of load-bearing equipment and rucksacks. This method of attachment has become a de facto standard for modular tactical gear, replacing the A.L.I.C.E system used in the earliest modular vest systems (which is still in use with most Western police departments).

column2: The Mombasa coast is almost worthless to us, but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Kenya. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.
column3: The Mombasa coast is almost worthless to us, but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Kenya. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.

column2: A functional economy needs a working monetary system. It needs a balanced money stock for the economic transactions to be done smoothly. Also an effective regulation of this is also needed.
column3: Une économie a besoin d'un système monétaire fiable. Une masse monétaire équilibrée permet des transactions sans à-coups. Il faut donc aussi la réguler.

column2: Our influence in Mongolia is such that we are in a position to pry the nation away from the Chinese and into our control. They would be our vassals, benefiting from protection against Chinese claims on their land.
column3: Our influence in Mongolia is such that we are in a position to pry the nation away from the Chinese and into our control. They would be our vassals, benefiting from protection against Chinese claims on their land.

column2: Monitors are a significant improvement over the earlier ironclad ships. They were harder to spot, faster and more heavily armoured and armed.
column3: Les cuirassés de classe Monitor sont nettement supérieurs aux premiers cuirassés. Ils sont plus difficiles à repérer, plus rapides, plus fortement blindés et armés.

column2: The legislation of your country has structured the market in such a way that each line of business is dominated by one very large company.
column3: La législation de votre pays a structuré le marché de façon à ce que chaque branche d'activité ne comprenne qu'une seule entreprise géante dominant les affaires.

column2: Church and state are a single body, and religious minorities face discrimination.

column2: The Moret Law granted freedom to slaves in Puerto Rico born after 1868, slaves who served in the Spanish Army, slaves over 60 years old, and slaves who were owned by the Spanish government. It was the first in a series of reforms that saw slavery ended in Peurto Rico, well before it was ended in other Spanish colonies.
column3: The Moret Law granted freedom to slaves in Puerto Rico born after 1868, slaves who served in the Spanish Army, slaves over 60 years old, and slaves who were owned by the Spanish government. column2: A mortar is an indirect fire weapon that fires shells at low velocities, short ranges, and high-arcing ballistic trajectories. It is typically muzzle-loading and has a barrel length less than 15 times its caliber.
column3: A mortar is an indirect fire weapon that fires shells at low velocities, short ranges, and high-arcing ballistic trajectories. It is typically muzzle-loading and has a barrel length less than 15 times its caliber.

column2: Motorising infantry is the first stage towards the mechanisation of an army. Civilian trucks are readily adaptable to military uses of transporting soldiers, towing guns, and carrying equipment and supplies. This greatly increases the strategic mobility of infantry units, which would otherwise rely on marches or railroads.
column3: Motorising infantry is the first stage towards the mechanisation of an army. column2: Supplying units of infantry with vehicles that could speedily transport them from one war zone to the next is the first step in the evolution of a truly modern armed forces.
column3: Supplying units of infantry with vehicles that could speedily transport them from one war zone to the next is the first step in the evolution of a truly modern armed forces.

column2: The introduction of a multitude of financial instruments meant not only a smoother flow of capital, but also that the middle class got better return on their private investments.
column3: La mise en place de divers instruments financiers a non seulement permis d'assurer un flux constant de capitaux, mais aussi permis d'améliorer le rendement des placements financiers des classes moyennes.

column2: Benito Amilcare Andrea Mussolini was an Italian politician who led the National Fascist Party and is credited with being one of the key figures in the creation of Fascism.
column3: Benito Amilcare Andrea Mussolini was an Italian politician who led the National Fascist Party and is credited with being one of the key figures in the creation of Fascism.

column2: A muzzle-loading rifle is a gun in which the projectile and propelling charge is loaded through the front-end of the gun, in contrast to a breech loading rifle. Hand held rifles were well-developed by the 1740s. A recognizable form of the 'muzzleloader' is the Kentucky Rifle, which was actually developed in Pennsylvania. The American Longrifle evolved from the German 'Jäger' rifle.
column3: Un fusil chargé par la bouche est une arme dont le projectile et la charge de propulsion sont chargé dans le front de l'arme, contrairement à un fusil chargemé par la culasse. Les fusils furent développés dans les années 1740. Une des forme reconnaissable de ce fusil est le fusil Kentucky, qui a été effectivement mis au point en Pennsylvanie. Le "Longrifle" américaine a évolué à partir du fusil allemand "Jäger".

column2: The secrets of Ancient Greece await!
column3: The secrets of Ancient Greece await!

column2: This was the ability to give good order fast and under heavy stress. This was trained, and of course when possible learnt through experience.
column3: Il s'agit de la capacité à donner rapidement le bon ordre en situation de stress. Cela faisait l'objet d'une formation mais s'acquérait aussi, dans la mesure du possible, par l'expérience.

column2: Several representatives of the Southern states oppose the talk of secession that are being voiced in more extremist circles. If we informally endorse a convention between them, they might be able to calm the secessionist mood.
column3: Plusieurs représentants des États sudistes s'opposent aux idées de sécession exprimées dans les cercles les plus extrémistes. Si nous soutenons officieusement une convention entre eux, ils parviendront peut-être à apaiser les tentations sécessionnistes.

column2: The works of this economist have been printed and distributed in your country. When the academics have debated and refined their dialogue, its merits will soon be known by large segments of your population. At this point it will produce changed economic behaviour and procedures in your country.
column3: Les travaux de cet économiste ont été imprimés et distribués dans votre pays. Lorsque les universitaires auront débattu et affiné leur dialogue, ses mérites seront bientôt connus par de larges segments de votre population. À ce stade, cela va produire un changement de comportement économique et un changement des procédures dans votre pays.

column2: The minorities in this province have accepted the policies of national assimilation.
column3: The minorities in this province have accepted the policies of national assimilation.

column2: This province is undergoing assimilation to remove the claims that other countries have upon it.
column3: This province is undergoing assimilation to remove the claims that other countries have upon it.

column2: The minorities in this province have rejected the policies of national assimilation.
column3: The minorities in this province have rejected the policies of national assimilation.

column2: There has been a great deal of change in our country. It will take some time to sort things out, before business as usual can resume.
column3: There has been a great deal of change in our country. It will take some time to sort things out, before business as usual can resume.

column2: The cohesion of nations is not always built over the spilt blood of other nations. It is also built by the belief that the people inside a territorial entity are like brothers, sharing common goals, ties, and symbols. The discovery of a common past and similarities in culture ensure that the people still wishes to live together inside one nation, even against external threat.
column3: La cohésion des nations n'est pas toujours construite sur le sang versé des autres nations. Elle est également construite par la conviction que les gens du peuple à l'intérieur d'une entité territoriale sont comme des frères, avec des objectifs communs, des liens et des symboles. La découverte d'un passé commun et des similitudes dans la culture font en sorte que le peuple veut vivre ensemble à l'intérieur d'une nation, même contre les menaces extérieures.

column2: The country is in a state of turmoil, and is in danger of rebellions.
column3: The country is in a state of turmoil, and is in danger of rebellions.

column2: As the twentieth century evolved the role of wireless communication pioneered in the development of radio by Guglielmo Marconi would rapidly increase as technological changes improved the clarity and quality of radio transmissions. By the early 1920s the improvements would result in the development of a whole new medium of information exchange as radio frequencies could be used to transmit content designed to entertain, inform, or convince. Realizing the potential power of this new medium, states began to regulate the assigning of radio frequencies, with some establishing national monopolies while others allowed for the development of commercial broadcasting networks. By the early 1930s the radio set would become one of the most desired consumer goods, and its potential use to not only entertain but develop and shape public opinion would soon be seized upon by politicians and those who aspired to political power
column3: Au cours du 20e siècle, le rôle de la communication sans fil, dont Guglielmo Marconi fut un pionnier en inventant la radio, prit de l'importance avec l'amélioration de la clarté et de la qualité des transmissions radio. Au début des années 1920, ces améliorations menèrent au développement de tout un système d'échange d'informations, par le fait que les fréquences radio pouvaient être utilisées pour transmettre un contenu destiné à distraire, informer ou convaincre. Réalisant la puissance de cette nouvelle technique, les états commencèrent à réguler l'assignement des fréquences radio. Certains établirent des monopoles nationaux, d'autres permirent le développement de réseaux de diffusion commerciale. Au début des années 1930, la radio était devenue le bien de consommation le plus désiré, et son potentiel, pour non seulement entretenir mais développer et façonner l'opinion publique, fut bientôt saisi par les politiciens, et par ceux qui aspiraient au pouvoir.

column2: Our level of potential army recruits has dropped to the point where, if we needed to go to war, we would be in a serious predicament. A national recruitment drive is required to encourage our citizens to join the reserves.
column3: Our level of potential army recruits has dropped to the point where, if we needed to go to war, we would be in a serious predicament. A national recruitment drive is required to encourage our citizens to join the reserves.

column2: When a population has been told that it is undefeatable for years, and it suddenly it loses a war, it can trigger a National Trauma. It means that too much psychological energy is spent at trying to understand why the country was lost and whom should be judged responsible. Sometimes this can trigger revanschism though.
column3: Quand une population s'est vu dire qu'elle était invincible et ce pendant des années, et que soudain, elle perd une guerre, cela peut déclencher un traumatisme national. Cela signifie que l'énergie psychique est consacré à essayer de comprendre pourquoi le pays a perdu et qui doit être jugé responsable. Parfois, cela peut déclencher un revanchisme.

column2: Nationalist rebels seek freedom for $COUNTRY_ADJ$. They are well led and equipped, and they will focus on achieving independence for their nation.
column3: Les rebelles nationalistes veulent la liberté pour leur peuple. Bien menés et bien équipés, ils vont tout mettre en uvre pour obtenir l'indépendance de leur nation.

column2: This region is considered a stronghold of nationalist support within the country.
column3: This region is considered a stronghold of nationalist support within the country.

column2: Nationalists protect the rights of the primary culture, they will support reforms depending on public opinion.
column3: Nationalists protect the rights of the primary culture, they will support reforms depending on public opinion.

column2: No more will the foreign dogs grow fat off of the sweat of our people! The time has come to seize all assets owned by outsiders, to be cared for by the state.
column3: Les chiens étrangers ne s'engraisseront plus grâce à la sueur de notre peuple ! Le temps est venu de saisir tous les actifs possédés par des pays étrangers, qui doivent être maintenant pris en charge par notre État.

column2: The time has come to integrate the native cultures of Mexico into the fabric of our country.
column3: The time has come to integrate the native cultures of Mexico into the fabric of our country.

column2: The time has come to integrate the Incan native cultures into the fabric of our country.
column3: The time has come to integrate the Incan native cultures into the fabric of our country.

column2: The time has come to integrate the Mayan native culture into the fabric of our country.
column3: The time has come to integrate the Mayan native culture into the fabric of our country.

column2: These rebels seek to restore rulership of the country to its proper native culture.
column3: These rebels seek to restore rulership of the country to its proper native culture.

column2: This is the doctrinal change of your navy. New ideas on how to move, attack and defend. The applications will change the combat values of your ships as tactics and strategies evolve.
column3: Il s'agit du changement de doctrine de votre marine. De nouvelles méthodes de déplacement, d'attaque et de défense feront évoluer la tactique et la stratégie et augmenteront le potentiel de combat de vos bâtiments.

column2: This is the naval branch that design equipment on your ships. Over time your naval commanders will get numerous wonderful toys such as Mines, Armor Piercing Projectiles and On-Board Recon Aircraft.
column3: C'est la branche de la construction navale qui conçoit l'équipement de vos bateaux. Au fil du temps, vos amiraux se verront proposer de magnifiques jouets tels que des mines, des obus perforants ou des avions de reconnaissance embarqués.

column2: A critical component of training for war at sea were naval exercises, in which ships would engage in mock-battles and other realistic training missions so as to understand how to act under wartime conditions. These exercises could involve entire fleets and stretch over days if not weeks, and were important not just for the training they gave, but also for the evaluation of the abilities under pressure of officers and sailors themselves.
column3: Un élément essentiel de la formation à la guerre en mer est l'exercice naval, où les navires se livrent aux batailles fictives et à d'autres missions d'entraînement réalistes afin de comprendre comment agir en temps de guerre. Ces exercices pouvaient impliquer des flottes entières et s'étirer sur plusieurs jours voire des semaines, et ils étaient importants non seulement pour la formation qu'ils donnaient, mais aussi pour l'évaluation des capacités des officiers sous la pression et des marins eux-mêmes.
Doctrine de la puissance de feu navale

column2: While a focus on winning the decisive naval battle was important, it was also considered valuable to use a variety of weaponry in order to achieve victory, in addition to the main armament of capital ships. Lighter warships were also important, as they could dart in and launch deadly torpedo attacks, while secondary armament was necessary to defend against these attacks. A balanced fleet of both capital and escort ships was essential to victory in modern naval combat.
column3: Bien que mettre l'accent sur la victoire navale décisive était essentiel, il était jugé utile d'utiliser une variété de navires afin de parvenir à cette victoire, en complément de l'armement principal des grands bâtiments de guerre. Les navires légers étaient également importants, car ils pouvaient être les dards en lancant des attaques de torpilles meurtrières, et donc tout l'armement secondaire était nécessaire pour se défendre contre ces attaques. Une flotte équilibrée à la fois en navires d'escorte et en grands bâtiments de guerre, était essentielle à la victoire dans le combat naval moderne.

column2: This was grounded in Jominian thought and later had its successor in Mahan. The basic idea was that the superiority of the leader and of the morale of the unit would break the back of the enemy and defeat it. Mahan theory was much more complex and held seeds to modern geopolitical though refined by McKinder.
column3: Fondée sur la pensée Jominienne et plus tard sur celle de son successeur Mahan. L'idée de base était que la supériorité du chef et du moral de l'unité romprait le dos de l'ennemi et le déferait. La théorie de Mahan été beaucoup plus complexe et jetait les graines de la pensée géopolitique moderne reprise par McKinder.

column2: Naval Hero Thesis vs Superior Crew Thesis
column3: Thèse navale du Héros contre Thèse de la supériorité de l'équipage

column2: With the Post Nelsonian Ideas developing in our Navy, our military thinkers have divided themselves into two camps. Those who favour the Naval Hero Thesis and those who favour the Superior Crew Thesis. We need to choose which we favour.
column3: Avec des idées post-nelsoniennes développées dans notre marine, nos penseurs militaires se sont divisés eux-mêmes en deux camps. Les partisans de la thèse navale du Héros et ceux qui favorisent la thèse de la supériorité de l'équipage. Nous avons besoin de choisir qui nous favorisons.

column2: These are the education and leadership principles used by your officer corps. Better leadership procedures will increase the organization and morale values of your ships.
column3: Il s'agit de la formation et des règles de commandement de vos officiers. De meilleures règles de commandement amélioreront l'organisation et le moral de vos équipages.

column2: This is the scientific evolution of your navy. Statistics, logistics and well laid plans became an important facet of war. New applications will increase the organization value of your ships.
column3: Il s'agit de l'évolution scientifique de votre marine. La statistique, la logistique, et la planification sont devenues des éléments importants de la guerre. Les nouvelles évolutions amélioreront l'organisation de vos navires.
Critère de réussite d'une frappe navale

column2: By measuring sea legs, speed of both enemy and friendly ships and earlier behaviour of the enemy, it was possible to optimize where and when to strike at the enemy and also to get realistic forecast of possible enemy strikes.
column3: En mesurant le pied marin (distance en mille marin) et la vitesse à la fois des navires ennemis et des navires amis et le comportement antérieur de l'adversaire. Il a été possible d'optimiser où et quand frapper l'ennemi et aussi pour obtenir des prévisions réalistes des possibles frappes de l'ennemi.
Entraînement aux postes de combat des officiers mariniers

column2: By excessively training the NCOs at the combat stations and with the equipment these not only became pioneers for the men, but also highly competent trainers of the smaller units.
column3: En entraînant au maximum les officiers mariniers aux postes de combat, ceux-ci devinrent des modèles pour les autres et des instructeurs très compétents pour les équipes.
Entraînement sur le terrain des sous-officiers

column2: By excessively training the NCOs in the field and with the equipment, these not only became pioneers for the men, but also highly competent trainers of the smaller units.
column3: En entraînant au maximum les sous-officiers sur le terrain, avec le matériel de temps de guerre, ceux-ci devinrent des modèles pour les autres et des instructeurs très compétents pour les petites unités.

column2: By excessively training the NCOs at the combat stations and with tactical situations these not only became the leaders of the men, but also the initiative takers in combat.
column3: En entraînant au maximum les officiers mariniers aux postes de combat, dans un cadre tactique, ceux-ci devinrent d'excellents chefs, capables de prendre des initiatives au combat.

column2: Our nation's industry has become slowly more focused on the production of basic necessities such as regular furniture, clothing, paper, liquor and lumber.
column3: Our nation's industry has become slowly more focused on the production of basic necessities such as regular furniture, clothing, paper, liquor and lumber.

column2: Kants transcendental idealism had meant that the world can only be understood through categories, or ideal concepts that are immanent in us, and empirically. This is sometimes called weak empiricism. The neokantian idealist, however, departed very far from Kant and more or less went back to a more classical idealism though interpreted in a kantian language referring to categories in their analyses of the world.
column3: L'idéalisme transcendantal de Kant veut que le monde ne peut se comprendre qu'à travers les catégories, ou concepts idéaux qui sont immanents à nous, et de façon empirique. Cela est parfois appelé l'empirisme faible. L'idéaliste neokantian, cependant, partit très loin de Kant et plus ou moins est retombé à un idéalisme plus classique mais interprété dans une langue kantienne se référant à des catégories dans leurs analyses du monde.

column2: The death penalty, is a government sanctioned practice whereby a person is put to death by the state as a punishment for a crime. Abolitionists believe capital punishment is the worst violation of human rights, because the right to life is the most important
column3: The death penalty, is a government sanctioned practice whereby a person is put to death by the state as a punishment for a crime. Abolitionists believe capital punishment is the worst violation of human rights, because the right to life is the most important

column2: Net Warrior - named after COL Robert B. Nett - replaced Land Warrior. Future Force Warrior was a futuristic research project with real deliverables folded into the Nett Warrior program. Situational awareness including the Rifleman Radio on every soldier, heads up display, location and Physiological Status Monitoring were the basic building blocks being implemented in increment 1.
column3: Net Warrior - named after COL Robert B. Nett - replaced Land Warrior. Future Force Warrior was a futuristic research project with real deliverables folded into the Nett Warrior program. Situational awareness including the Rifleman Radio on every soldier, heads up display, location and Physiological Status Monitoring were the basic building blocks being implemented in increment 1.

column2: Neurology is a medical specialty dealing with disorders of the nervous system. Specifically, it deals with the diagnosis and treatment of all categories of disease involving the central,peripheral, and autonomic nervous systems.
column3: Neurology is a medical specialty dealing with disorders of the nervous system. Specifically, it deals with the diagnosis and treatment of all categories of disease involving the central,peripheral, and autonomic nervous systems.

column2: Our country deliberately takes no sides. We do not go to war, even against those the world universally reviles, and thus expect that no one shall go to war against us. This means we will likely never achieve recognition as a 'mover and shaker', but it also protects us. We shall not abandon our principles for the sake of power and influence.
column3: Our country deliberately takes no sides. We do not go to war, even against those the world universally reviles, and thus expect that no one shall go to war against us. This means we will likely never achieve recognition as a 'mover and shaker', but it also protects us. We shall not abandon our principles for the sake of power and influence.

column2: We will create a new capital for Japan in the city of Edo, giving it a new name and building it into a glorious place that will show the world that Japan is a power to be reckoned with.
column3: We will create a new capital for Japan in the city of Edo, giving it a new name and building it into a glorious place that will show the world that Japan is a power to be reckoned with.

column2: A New Capital in the East
column3: A New Capital in the East

column2: A new plantation has been started in this province, moving production over to cash crops rather than than the traditional farming which has been done here by the natives.
column3: A new plantation has been started in this province, moving production over to cash crops rather than than the traditional farming which has been done here by the natives.

column2: The government of $TAG_2_0$ offered the peace with the following terms: $STRING_0_1$

column2: The availability of cheap paper and advances in printing press technology have spawned the creation of newsprint, bringing news and culture to a literate audience both locally and abroad. To many, this is the vehicle upon which propaganda and public awareness will be based in the years to come.
column3: The availability of cheap paper and advances in printing press technology have spawned the creation of newsprint, bringing news and culture to a literate audience both locally and abroad. To many, this is the vehicle upon which propaganda and public awareness will be based in the years to come.

column2: Higher Education in our country has advanced to the point where news in written form is in high demand. The creation of companies able to meet that demand is rapidly becoming necessary.
column3: Higher Education in our country has advanced to the point where news in written form is in high demand. The creation of companies able to meet that demand is rapidly becoming necessary.

column2: The Niederwalddenkmal is a monument in the Niederwald park, Hesse, Germany. The monument's central figure is a ten meter high statue of Germania, the personification of the German nation, holding aloft the recovered Imperial crown of Germany, flanked by two statues representing War and Peace respectively. Built between 1871 and 1883, the monument was commissioned after the Franco-Prussian war, to commemorate the founding of the German Empire. Let us all rejoice in the glory of our nation united by erecting a monument to stand the tests of time!
column3: Le Niederwalddenkmal est un monument du parc Niederwald d'Hesse, en Allemagne. Au sommet de celui-ci se dresse une statue Germania de 10 mètres de haut, allégorie de la nation allemande. Elle tient dans une main la couronne de l'empereur et dans l'autre l'épée impériale. Sur les côtés du monument, deux petites statues représentent respectivement la Guerre et la Paix. Construit entre 1871 et 1883, le Niederwalddenkmal fut commandé après la guerre franco-allemande pour célébrer la fondation du nouvel Empire allemand. Célébrons l'unification de notre nation en érigeant un monument qui résistera à l'épreuve du temps !

column2: By training large formations at night, the performance of the naval units under harsh conditions improved and made naval leaders better accustomed to the special tactical situations at night or in fog.
column3: L'entraînement de nuit de vastes formations a permis d'améliorer les performances des unités navales en conditions difficiles. Les commandants ont aussi pu s'habituer aux conditions tactiques particulières de la nuit et du brouillard.

column2: As the understanding of chemistry increases, so too does our ability to extract needed nitrates advance.
column3: As the understanding of chemistry increases, so too does our ability to extract needed nitrates advance.

column2: Nitrates are now being used to fertilize farm soil in the area.
column3: Nitrates are now being used to fertilize farm soil in the area.

column2: This was the technique of producing reliable explosives out of nitrates. This often meant using fertilizers as base material.
column3: Cette technique consistait à fabriquer des explosifs efficaces à partir de nitrates. Le matériau de base était fréquemment l'engrais.

column2: We learn on the field of battle
column3: Nous apprenons sur le champs de bataille.
Des officiers locaux commandent nos navires.
Des officiers locaux mènent nos troupes.

column3: Les troupes sont entraînées de manière traditionnelle.

column2: We attempted to free ourselves from foreign rule. We must wait until there is another opportunity, as for now they are watching us closely.
column3: We attempted to free ourselves from foreign rule. We must wait until there is another opportunity, as for now they are watching us closely.

column2: Instead of focusing on military might and conquest, Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers, and quickly, or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.
column3: Instead of focusing on military might and conquest, Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers, and quickly, or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.

Les syndicats non socialistes sont autorisés.

column2: No one is allowed to vote.

The North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) is an intergovernmental military alliance established for the collective defense of its signatories. Until the Korean War, it was little more than a political association, at which point, the United States and its allies developed a centralized military commander in retaliation to the apparent threat of communism and continued to serve as a deterrent to a potential Soviet invasion of Western Europe for the duration of the Cold War.
column3: The North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) is an intergovernmental military alliance established for the collective defense of its signatories. Until the Korean War, it was little more than a political association, at which point, the United States and its allies developed a centralized military commander in retaliation to the apparent threat of communism and continued to serve as a deterrent to a potential Soviet invasion of Western Europe for the duration of the Cold War.
Métier à tisser automatique de Northrop

column2: This was a mechanized power loom that produced fabric with a much higher quality than before. But also the one and the same machine could produce several different types of fabric which made it extremely flexible.
column3: Ce métier à tisser automatique produisait un tissu de bien meilleure qualité que les précédents. Il permettait aussi de produire plusieurs types différents de tissus, ce qui le rendait très flexible.

column2: This was a general cultural theme where the glory of the past was raised to nigh-on-divine status. As equality and plurality were ideas of the future, Nostalgic Romanticism, quickly became a reactionary movement raising the goblet for absolute monarchy and the church of the fathers.
column3: Ce fut une thema de culture générale où la gloire du passé a été élevée au rang du presque-divin. Comme l'égalité et la pluralité sont des idées de l'avenir, « Nostalgic Romaticism », est rapidement devenu un mouvement réactionnaire pour élever la coupe de la monarchie absolue et l'église des pères.

column2: We are arresting the reactionary agitators and proceeding with reforms as planned.
column3: We are arresting the reactionary agitators and proceeding with reforms as planned.

column2: Our nation has been designated a nuclear weapon state by the Non-Proliferation Treaty, has nuclear weapons but is not a member of the Non-Proliferation Treaty, or is believed, but not confirmed, to have nuclear weapons. As long as we have access to nuclear weapons, the threat of mutual assured destruction, or the full-scale use of high-yield nuclear weapons between two or more opposing sides, remains very real.
column3: Our nation has been designated a nuclear weapon state by the Non-Proliferation Treaty, has nuclear weapons but is not a member of the Non-Proliferation Treaty, or is believed, but not confirmed, to have nuclear weapons. As long as we have access to nuclear weapons, the threat of mutual assured destruction, or the full-scale use of high-yield nuclear weapons between two or more opposing sides, remains very real.

column2: Nylon was intended to be a synthetic replacement for silk and substituted for it in many different products after silk became scarce during World War II. It replaced silk in military applications such as parachutes and flak vests, and was used in many types of vehicle tires
column3: Nylon was intended to be a synthetic replacement for silk and substituted for it in many different products after silk became scarce during World War II. It replaced silk in military applications such as parachutes and flak vests, and was used in many types of vehicle tires

column2: A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. Chile must make its claim so none can deny us.
column3: A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. Chile must make its claim so none can deny us.

column2: Submarine design continued to improve in the early 20th-century, to the point where submarines became able to spend significant amounts of time at sea, allowing them to intercept enemy warships and shipping at a significant distance from home bases.
column3: La conception des sous-marins a continué de s'améliorer au début du 20e siècle, en un point où les sous-marins sont devenus capable de passer beaucoup de temps en mer, leur permettant d'intercepter les navires de guerre ennemis et d'entreprendre des expéditions à grande distance de leurs bases d'attache.

column2: Our state is changing, evolving from a simple government of bureaucrats and despots to a true organism of the state. We march into a modern era, one where new ideas will tranform the way we live.
column3: Our state is changing, evolving from a simple government of bureaucrats and despots to a true organism of the state. We march into a modern era, one where new ideas will tranform the way we live.

column2: This meant finding and destroying the enemy High Sea Navy at any cost.
column3: Cela consistait à trouver et à détruire la marine de haute mer ennemie à n'importe quel prix.

column2: By using new discoveries in hydraulics and pumping techniques, new machinery was developed that could pump the black gold up to the surface.
column3: On a pu fabriquer, grâce aux nouvelles techniques hydrauliques et de pompage, des machines capables de remonter l'or noir jusqu'à la surface.

column2: The production process of vegetable oil involves the removal of oil from plant components, typically seeds. This can be done via mechanical extraction using an oil mill or chemical extraction using a solvent. The extracted oil can then be purified and, if required, refined or chemically altered.
column3: The production process of vegetable oil involves the removal of oil from plant components, typically seeds. This can be done via mechanical extraction using an oil mill or chemical extraction using a solvent. The extracted oil can then be purified and, if required, refined or chemically altered.

column2: This style of business culture meant that the owners treated the business as a family shop or restaurant. The border between private and business was very unclear. The practice became very emotional and the owners would take much large risks for their business, but at the cost of professionalism.
column3: Ce style de culture d'entreprise signifie que les propriétaires de l'entreprise traitent celle-ci comme un magasin ou un restaurant familiale. La frontière entre le privé et les entreprises est très peu clair. La pratique devient très émotionnelle et les propriétaires prennent de grands risques pour leur entreprise, mais au prix du professionnalisme.

column2: This mean that the legislation of your country has structured the market in such way that each line of business is composed of a few firms, all of which are of large size.
column3: La législation de votre pays a structuré le marché de façon à ce que chaque branche d'activité comprenne peu d'entreprises, mais toutes de grandes tailles.

column2: By adding small flying machines on top of the turrets the ship could get much better reconnaissance. Later on these aircraft would be equipped with machine guns and bombs, eventually becoming dive bombers.
column3: En plaçant de petits avions au-dessus des tourelles, les navires ont bénéficié d'une bien meilleure reconnaissance. Plus tard, ces avions furent équipés de mitrailleuses et de bombes et évoluèrent en bombardiers en piqué.

column2: Our nation's growth rate is very low-- roughly equivalent to one child for every two healthy adults.
column3: Our nation's growth rate is very low-- roughly equivalent to one child for every two healthy adults.

column2: Our nation's growth rate is low-- roughly equivalent to three children for every four healthy adults.
column3: Our nation's growth rate is low-- roughly equivalent to three children for every four healthy adults.

column2: Conscripts are drafted for one year.
column3: Conscripts are drafted for one year.

column2: Our country accepts all comers with open arms.
column3: Our country accepts all comers with open arms.

column2: Corporal Punishment is a punishment intended to cause physical pain on a person. It is not acceptable that a society which prohibits any form of physical violence between adults would accept that adults subject children to physical violence.
column3: Corporal Punishment is a punishment intended to cause physical pain on a person. It is not acceptable that a society which prohibits any form of physical violence between adults would accept that adults subject children to physical violence.

column2: Operational destruction called for airpower to focus on the bombing of the infrastructure that supported the enemy's field units, in order to prevent their resupply and redeployment, thus decreasing their mobility and rendering them incapable of responding to friendly offensives launched against enemy weak points.
column3: L'opération de destruction impliquait que la puissance aérienne se concentre sur le bombardement de l'infrastructure qui appuyait les unités ennemies sur le terrain, afin d'empêcher leur ravitaillement et leur redéploiement, diminuant ainsi leur mobilité et de les rendre incapables de répondre aux offensives lancées contre leurs points faibles.

column2: Racism is the norm and minorities are constrained by blatant legal requirements, relegating them to second-class status.
column3: Racism is the norm and minorities are constrained by blatant legal requirements, relegating them to second-class status.

column2: These were instruments that made it possible to exactly measure the range from the gun to the enemy vessel and it vastly improved hit chances.
column3: Ces instruments permettaient de mesurer avec exactitude la distance entre les armes et la cible, améliorant ainsi considérablement la précision de tir.

column2: By delimiting our borders with the British Cape Colony, we can strengthen our relations with the United Kingdom.
column3: En délimitant nos frontières avec la colonie britannique du Cap, nous renforcerons nos relations avec le Royaume-Uni.

column2: Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun, the role of the Emperor has been confined to that of figurehead. We lead Japan, yet we do not. Recently, the leadership of the Shogun has come into question. His increasing inability to deal with foreigners in a way that shows any manner of leadership compels the Emperor to act-- with or without the Shogun's permission. We shall send out a call to the people in our own name, demanding they rise up and throw out the foreigners that the Shogun will not.
column3: Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun, the role of the Emperor has been confined to that of figurehead. We lead Japan, yet we do not. His increasing inability to deal with foreigners in a way that shows any manner of leadership compels the Emperor to act-- with or without the Shogun's permission. We shall send out a call to the people in our own name, demanding they rise up and throw out the foreigners that the Shogun will not.

column2: The Ostend Manifesto proposes that the Island of Cuba should be annexed to the United States as a slave state, to balance the expected influx of new free-states in the West. By supporting the manifesto, we can calm tension over the slavery issue domestically, but it might reduce our standing with the European Great Powers significantly.
column3: Le manifeste d'Ostendo propose que l'Ile de Cuba soit annexée aux Etats-Unis en tant qu'Etat esclavagiste, pour équilibrer la future arrivée de nouveaux Etats-libres dans l'ouest du pays. En soutenant ce manifeste, nous pourrions calmer les tensions sur l'esclavage, mais elle peut dégrader nos relations avec les Grandes Puissances européennes de façon significative.

column2: The current Chancellor of our nation, von Bismarck is a remarkable statesman. perhaps one of the finest our nation will ever know.
column3: The current Chancellor of our nation, von Bismarck is a remarkable statesman. perhaps one of the finest our nation will ever know.

column2: The full equality of Islamic millets, and the importance given to traditional Sharia law, will ensure greater peace and adherence to order within Islamic provinces.

column2: A number of Ottoman policies regarding Christians within the Empire, such as the Jizya tax and restrictions on work and movement, set the stage for issues in the Balkans for years to come. These policies were not revoked until the Tanzimat Reforms which began in 1839.

You must not allow Kyoto and your capital to become occupied.§W

column2: The Palais Garnier was, from its inauguration in 1875 to 1989, the chief home of the Paris Opera. Designed by Charles Garnier in the Neo-Baroque style, the Opera House was widely regarded in its day as a masterpiece of modern architecture, and was widely imitated all over the western world. The Palais also served as the inspiration for Gaston Leroux' classic novel 'The Phantom of the Opera'.
column3: Le Palais Garnier a accueilli l'Opéra de Paris entre 1875 (date de son inauguration) et 1989. Conçu par Charles Garnier dans le style néo-baroque, l'Opéra fut considéré en son temps comme un chef-d'uvre d'architecture moderne, ce qui lui valut d'être largement imité dans tout l'Occident. Le Palais Garnier a également inspiré Gaston Leroux pour son célèbre roman "Le Fantôme de l'Opéra".

column2: Pan-nationalist rebels seek to unify, in a free and independent nation-state, with their perceived cultural kin. Gouvernés par les idéaux du mouvement nationaliste romantique, leur sentiment d'appartenance à la terre pour laquelle ils se battent font d'eux des ennemis tenaces et déterminés du maintien de l'ordre et de la paix.

column2: As a result of the huge manpower requirements of militaries in an age of industrial warfare, the restoration of peace often resulted in the creation of large numbers of veterans, many of whom found it difficult to adjust to a return to civilian life and who possessed basic military training that could be put to use if needed. With the growth of revolutionary movements on the Left and particularly on the Right, the potential use of disgruntled military veterans for the purpose of challenging the actions and influence of ideological opponents grew rapidly. Their existence and growth in times of political, social and economic upheaval proved challenging to the ability of many States to maintain law and order, and the activities of such paramilitaries were often cited by those opposed to Liberal Capitalism of the inherent weakness of democracy in the face of revolutionary challenges that threatened the social order
column3: Résultant de l'énorme nécessité en main d'oeuvre militaire en ces temps de guerre moderne, la retour de la paix entraîne de faite la création d'un grand nombre de vétérans. Beaucoup d'entre eux trouvent difficile de s'adapter à un retour à la vie civile, alors qu'ils possèdent un entrainement militaire basique qui pourrait être mis à profit si nécessaire. Avec l'augmentation des mouvements révolutionnaires de Gauche, et particulièrement ceux de Droite, l'utilisation de vétérans militaires mécontents dans le but de contester les actions et l'influence d'opposants idéologiques devint des plus fréquents. Leur nombre grandissant, en temps de bouleversement politique, social et économique  rendit le maintien de l'ordre difficile dans de nombreux Etats. Les activités de tels paramilitaires étaient parfois citées par les opposants au capitalisme libéral, comme l'inhérente faiblesse de la démocratie face à des contestateurs révolutionaires qui menaçent l'ordre social.

column2: Folkskolereformen', The 'People School' Reform, was a law passed in Sweden in 1842 that introduced compulsory schooling for all Swedish children in a number of basic subjects, provided for by the state. 'Folkskolan' would remain the basis of Sweden's educational system up until the early 1970's, when it was sadly phased out in favor of ignorance and poor grammar.
column3: La "Folkskolereformen" (la réforme de l'école du peuple) est une loi suédoise de 1842 qui rendit obligatoire pour tous les enfants du pays un certain nombre d'enseignements de base désignés par l'État. La "Folkskolan" restera la base du système éducatif suédois jusqu'au début des années 1970, époque à laquelle elle fut malheureusement abandonnée.

column2: Since the Treaty of Nerchinsk (1689), the Russian Empire has recognized the Aigun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China. There are many within the government, however, who believe it would be in our best interest to access a southern port upon the Sea of Japan-- namely the Chinese city of HaIshenwai. Considering the Chinese only barely control their northeastern provinces, and this new 'Taiping' government is not one we concluded the treaty with, it seems within our right to approach them for negotiation.

There are many within the government, however, who believe it would be in our best interest to access a southern port upon the Sea of Japan-- namely the Chinese city of HaIshenwai. Considering the Chinese only barely control their northeastern provinces, and this new 'Taiping' government is not one we concluded the treaty with, it seems within our right to approach them for negotiation.

column2: Since the Treaty of Nerchinsk (1689), the Russian Empire has recognized the Argun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China.  In the mid 19th century the Russians would expand beyond this border to seize the vast lands between the Stanovoy Mountains and the Amur River. The Western Allies would later bring the Second Opium War to a conclusion by burning the Chinese Emperor's summer palaces, and entering Beijing. A cunning major general named Nikolay Ignatiev was able to convinced the Chinese that only Russian support would cause the allies to evacuate Peking. The price for this support was the Convention of Peking, which confirmed Muravyov's gains and, additionally, ceded territory between the Ussuri River and the Pacific to Russia. Thus, Russia had gained some 350,000 square miles of territory without firing a single shot.
column3: Depuis le traité de Nerchinsk (1689), lEmpire russe a reconnu le fleuve Argun et les monts Stanovoy comme frontière naturelle entre la Russie et la Chine. Au cours du XIXe siècle, les Russes franchirent cette frontière pour semparer des vastes territoires entre les monts Stanovoy et le fleuve Amour. Les puissances occidentales mirent plus tard un terme à la seconde guerre de lopium en brûlant le palais dété de lempereur et en semparant de Pékin. Un général russe avisé du nom de Nicolaï Ignatiev parvint à convaincre les chinois que seul le soutien de la Russie permettrait l'évacuation de Pékin par les alliés. Le prix de ce soutien fut la convention de Pékin, qui entérinait les conquêtes de Muravyov et cédait à la Russie les territoires entre le fleuve Ussuri et la côte pacifique. Ainsi, la Russie gagna-t-elle 560 000 kilomètres carrés sans tirer un coup de fusil.

column2: Phased array optics (PAO) is the technology of controlling the phase of light waves transmitting or reflecting from a two-dimensional surface by means of adjustable surface elements. It is the optical analog of phased array radar. By dynamically controlling the optical properties of a surface on a microscopic scale, it is possible to steer the direction of light beams, or the view direction of sensors, without any moving parts. Hardware associated with beam steering applications is commonly called an optical phased array (OPA). Phased array beam steering is used for optical switching and multiplexing in optoelectronic devices, and for aiming laser beams on a macroscopic scale.
column3: Phased array optics (PAO) is the technology of controlling the phase of light waves transmitting or reflecting from a two-dimensional surface by means of adjustable surface elements. It is the optical analog of phased array radar. By dynamically controlling the optical properties of a surface on a microscopic scale, it is possible to steer the direction of light beams, or the view direction of sensors, without any moving parts. Hardware associated with beam steering applications is commonly called an optical phased array (OPA). Phased array beam steering is used for optical switching and multiplexing in optoelectronic devices, and for aiming laser beams on a macroscopic scale.

column2: Phenomenology was the view that something 'is' in relation to how it is experienced, its causes, its purposes and its grounds. It is neither correctly described as either realism or idealism, but to some degree refutes both.
column3: La phénoménologie affirmait que chaque chose est en rapport avec l'expérience que l'on en a : ses causes, ses objectifs et ses fondements. Elle ne rejoint ni le réalisme ni l'idéalisme mais, à un certain degré, réfute les deux.

column2: This area is the development of thoughts in general. Specifically though it is the change view of the human being and its consciousness, it is also a discussion concerning the metaquestion of what we can know anything about. However, the areas that Philosophy undertakes are so big it could be called 'a forthgoing discussion about everything'.
column3: Cette zone est le développement des pensées en général. Plus précisément si la pensée est l'affichage de la variation de l'être humain et de sa conscience, elle est aussi une discussion relative à la meta-question de ce que nous ne pouvons pas savoir. Cependant, les zones où se déroulent la philosophie sont si grandes que cela pourrait être appelé «une discussion à propos de tout ».

column2: This is the study of philosophical questions about language, especially about meaning and truth of words, phrases, and sentences in general. It doesn't ask what particular words mean, or whether particular sentences are true. Except of course for words and sentences about the language. Rather, it asks what meaning and truth in general are. It was developed out of Wittgensteins critique of his own earlier work Tractatus Logico-Philosophicus, and to some extent the whole analytic tradition.
column3: C'est l'étude des questions philosophiques sur la langue, en particulier sur le sens et la vérité des mots, expressions et des phrases en général. Elle ne demande pas ce que les mots signifient en particulier, ou si les phrases sont notamment vraies. Sauf bien sûr pour les mots et les phrases de la langue. Au contraire, elle demande quel est le sens et la vérité en général. Elle a été développée à partir de la critique de Wittgenstein de ses propres travaux antérieurs 'Tractatus logico-philosophicus', et dans une certaine mesure par toute la tradition analytique.

column2: Proudhon was apprenticed as a printer and became interested in politics after he was involved in the printing of The New Industrial and Cooperative World by Charles Fourier. Proudhon now turned to writing and in 1843 published What is Property? In the book Proudhon attacks the injustices of inequality and coined the phrase, 'property is theft'. Proudhon published his most important work, System of Economic Contradictions, was published in 1846. Karl Marx responded to Proudhon's book by writing The Poverty of Philosophy (1847). This was the beginning of the long-term struggle of ideas between the two men. Proudhon was opposed to Marx's authoritarianism and his main influence was on the libertarian socialist movement.
column3: Proudhon fut mis en apprentissage comme imprimeur, et s'intéressa à la politique après avoir été impliqué dans l'impression de "la nouvelle zone industrielle et de coopération mondiale" par Charles Fourier. Proudhon désormais se tourna vers l'écriture et publia en 1843 "Qu'est-ce que la propriété ?". Dans le livre, Proudhon attaque les injustices de l'inégalité et invente l'expression, «la propriété c'est le vol». Proudhon a publié son travail le plus important, "système des contradictions économiques", en 1846. Karl Marx a répondu au livre de Proudhon en écrivant "La Misère de la philosophie" (1847). Ce fut le début de la lutte à long terme d'idées entre les deux hommes. Proudhon était opposé à l'autoritarisme de Marx et sa principale influence a pesé sur le mouvement socialiste libertaire.

column2: Plastic-tipped bullets are a type of bullet meant to confer the advantages of both spitzer and hollow-point bullets. They consist of a fairly normal hollow-point bullet with the frontal cavity filled in by hard plastic, which is molded into a streamlined shape mimicking the shape of a spitzer bullet. Upon impact, the plastic drives into the hollow point, or fragments into small pieces and the bullet performs like a regular hollow-point, expanding ("mushrooming") to a larger diameter or fragmenting. The end result is a bullet with the streamlined characteristics of spitzer bullet and the increased terminal mushrooming of JHPs. These bullets possess the aerodynamics for longer, more accurate flights, and the in-target performance to ensure high lethality.
column3: Plastic-tipped bullets are a type of bullet meant to confer the advantages of both spitzer and hollow-point bullets. They consist of a fairly normal hollow-point bullet with the frontal cavity filled in by hard plastic, which is molded into a streamlined shape mimicking the shape of a spitzer bullet. Upon impact, the plastic drives into the hollow point, or fragments into small pieces and the bullet performs like a regular hollow-point, expanding ("mushrooming") to a larger diameter or fragmenting. The end result is a bullet with the streamlined characteristics of spitzer bullet and the increased terminal mushrooming of JHPs. These bullets possess the aerodynamics for longer, more accurate flights, and the in-target performance to ensure high lethality.

column2: Polymer-cased ammunition (or PCA) is the concept applied to define the alternative to use polymer-based casings instead of metal-based (brass, aluminium or steel mainly) in the manufacturing of ammunition. PCA is considered an alternative to reduce cost and weight in ammunition for guns and handguns. PCA is an option, not the replacement of metal cased ammunition. Although shotgun shells are already made with a great quantity of polymer and other materials, this concept is not applicable since no shotgun shells are made 100% of metal.
column3: Polymer-cased ammunition (or PCA) is the concept applied to define the alternative to use polymer-based casings instead of metal-based (brass, aluminium or steel mainly) in the manufacturing of ammunition. PCA is considered an alternative to reduce cost and weight in ammunition for guns and handguns. PCA is an option, not the replacement of metal cased ammunition. Although shotgun shells are already made with a great quantity of polymer and other materials, this concept is not applicable since no shotgun shells are made 100% of metal.

column2: The polyphase system is a way to help transmit alternating current efficiently. In it two or more phases travel simultaneously. In industrial applications three waves is the standards, although at first two phases were used. The invention of the polyphase system by Nikola Tesla meant the final loss for Thomas Alva Edison and his direct current.
column3: Efficace, le système polyphasé permet de faciliter la transmission du courant alternatif, en faisant passer plusieurs phases simultanément. Dans l'application industrielle, la configuration standard est de trois phases, mais au début deux phases étaient utilisées. L'invention du système polyphasé par Nikola Tesla signe la défaite de Thomas Alva Edison, et de son courant continu.

column2: Pragmatism is perhaps the only peculiarly American school of philosophy. The name denotes a concern for the practical, taking human action and its consequences as the basic measure of truth, value, etc. This translates to experimentation not merely as a method of scientific investigation but as the primary way humans engage each other and the world around them.
column3: Le pragmatisme est peut-être la seule école de la philosophie typiquement américaine. Ce nom désigne un sujet de préoccupation par la pratique, de prendre des mesures de l'homme et des conséquences comme la mesure de base de vérité, de valeur, etc. Cela se traduit par l'expérimentation non pas seulement comme une méthode d'investigation scientifique, mais de la façon dont les humains s'engagent entre eux et le monde autour d'eux.

column2: In wake of a series of economic shocks that shook the world in the first part of the twentieth century some politicians would become influenced by new economic theories regarding supply and demand and their interplay in times of economic crisis. Based upon the concept that money spent in the economy has a multiplier effect that increases economic activity by generating income that can contribute to new demand, some politicians made appeals in wake of economic declines for priming the pump to reinflate demand and thus resume economic growth. Not all politicians and economist accepted this argument, and to some such state intervention appeared as an introduction of socialist principles into the economy, but the political impact of having the State appear to be actively trying to improve economic conditions made such political promises very appealing to those negatively impacted by economic downturns.
column3: Dans le sillage d'une série de chocs économiques qui ont secoué le monde dans la première partie du XXe siècle, certains politiciens ont été touchés par les nouvelles théories économiques concernant l'offre et la demande et leur interaction en temps de crise économique. Basé sur le concept que l'argent dépensé dans l'économie a un effet multiplicateur qui augmente l'activité économique en générant des revenus qui peuvent contribuer à la nouvelle demande, ces politiciens ont exorté à "amorcer la pompe" pour regonfler la demande et donc réamorcer la croissance économique. Pas tous les hommes politiques et économistes ont accepté cet argument, et une certaine intervention de l'Etat telle qu'elle apparaissait dans une introduction des principes socialistes dans l'économie, mais l'impact que l'État puisse chercher activement à améliorer les conditions économiques rend de telles promesses politiques très attrayantes.

column2: Compulsory voting is a system in which electors are obliged to vote in elections or attend a polling place on voting day. If an eligible voter does not attend a polling place, he or she may be subject to punitive measures such as fines or community service. Compulsory voting also prevents disenfranchisement of the socially disadvantaged. In reallity however this compels unmotivated parts of the electorate to vote, being highly susceptible to finical incitements and political campaign material, thus giving people of wealth, an effective greater share of the votes.

In reallity however this compels unmotivated parts of the electorate to vote, being highly susceptible to finical incitements and political campaign material, thus giving people of wealth, an effective greater share of the votes.

column2: The Ems Ukaz was a decree published by Tsar Alexander II in 1876, banning the use of the Ukrainian language, disparagingly referred to as 'the Little Russian dialect', in any and all printed material, with exception only made for the reprinting of old documents. The ukaz was named after Bad Ems, Germany, a German spa resort where the Tsar was, at the time of the ukaz' promulgation, staying.
column3: L'ukaz d'Ems est un décret publié par le tsar Alexandre II en 1876 et interdisant l'emploi de la langue ukrainienne (qualifiée avec mépris de "petit dialecte russe") dans tous les documents imprimés, sauf en cas de réédition de documents anciens. L'ukaz porte le nom de Bad Ems, station thermale allemande où le tsar résidait lorsqu'il fut promulgué.
