column2: La Légion étrangère', known in English as 'The Foreign Legion', is military unit of the French army, with a unique distinction in that it accepts its recruits regardless of their national and personal backgrounds. While originally established as early as 1830, the Legion did not win the lasting legacy it enjoys today until it had seen action during, among others, The Spanish Carlist Wars, The French Intervention in Mexico, the Battle of Camarón, the Franco-Prussian war and, in fact, almost every conflict involving France up until and through the modern era. The image of the young man, perhaps on the run from some personal tragedy, oppression, debt or a criminal past, who joins the French Foreign Legion to serve a tour of personal redemption in the deserts of French Algeria, has since become one of the most iconic and enduring images of the 19th century. Promote the Legion, and see recruits flock to our banners.
column3: La Légion étrangère est une unité militaire de l'armée française qui se distingue par le recrutement de ses membres quelles que soient leur nationalité ou leur histoire personnelle. Initialement formée dans les années 1830, la Légion étrangère gagna véritablement ses galons lors des guerres espagnoles carlistes, de l'intervention française au Mexique, de la bataille de Camarón, de la guerre franco-prusse ainsi que pratiquement tous les conflits impliquant la France et ce, jusqu'à nos jours. L'image du jeune homme, peut-être en proie à une tragédie personnelle, à une oppression, à une dette ou à un passé criminel, qui rejoint la Légion étrangère en guise de rédemption dans les déserts de l'Algérie française, est l'une des images les plus symboliques du XIXe siècle. Promouvez la Légion et accueillez de nouvelles recrues sous nos drapeaux.

column2: A peculiar Military-Industrial complex is emerging in the now heavily industrialized Ruhr-area, where several leading industrialists, notably from the Krupp family, are working together with Prussian Army & Government officials to develop, in coherence with Prussian state ideology, our military and industrial capabilities. Voltaire has said of Prussia that it is an army with a country, and nowhere is this more true than in the Ruhr.
column3: Un singulier complexe militaro-industriel voit le jour dans la région très industrialisée de la Ruhr. Plusieurs grands industriels, notamment la famille Krupp, collaborent avec les fonctionnaires du gouvernement et de l'armée prusses pour développer, en harmonie avec l'idéologie d'État prusse, nos capacités militaires et industrielles. Voltaire avait décrit la Prusse comme étant une armée dotée d'un pays, et cela se vérifie dans la Ruhr.

column2: Evolving from the iconoclasm of the Dada movement, Surrealism sought via its works to engage the public into a voyage of discovery of the inner workings of the mind, where they felt true reality lay in a world increasingly corrupted by incessant materialism and the horrors of modern warfare. Though the term was coined by Andre Breton, its most famous proponent within the world of painting would be the flamboyant Salvador Dali
column3: L'évolution de l'iconoclasme du mouvement Dada, le surréalisme par ses travaux engage le public dans un voyage de découverte du fonctionnement interne de l'esprit, où la réalité profane réside dans un monde de plus en plus corrompu par un matérialisme incessant et touché par les horreurs de la guerre moderne. Bien que le terme ait été inventé par André Breton, son partisan le plus célèbre dans le monde de la peinture sera le flamboyant Salvador Dali.

column2: The Swedish Armed Cruiser Association was formed in 1912 in order to raise money for the purchase of a modern coastal defense cruiser for the Swedish Navy. The project met with a great deal of popular success, and the Association was, within a mere hundred days, able to present His Majesty Gustav V with the sum of some 15 million kronor, which would eventually be used to commission the 'HMS Sverige', launched in 1915.
column3: L'association suédoise Pansarbåtsföreningen fut formée en 1912 afin de lever des fonds destinés à l'achat d'un croiseur de défense côtière moderne pour la marine suédoise. Le projet remporta un vif succès et l'association réussit en une centaine de jours à offrir au roi Gustav V la somme de 15 millions de couronnes, somme utilisée pour construire le "HMS Sverige" qui entra en service en 1915.

column2: Cooperation between private industrialists and the military, on the issues of national defense and war policy, have led to the development of a particularly important web of connections, personal ties and acquaintances, with just an ever so slight hint of corruption, that can best be described as a Military-Industrial Complex. By furthering the goals and ambitions of these informal networks within our academia, we can boost industrial and military research, at the expense of navy and culture.
column3: La coopération des industriels privés et des militaires, en termes de défense nationale et de politique belliciste, a conduit à la mise en place de réseaux relationnels particulièrement importants, sur fond de légère corruption, qu'il convient mieux de qualifier de complexe militaro-industriel. En repoussant les limites des objectifs et ambitions de ces réseaux informels au sein de notre académie, nous pourrons améliorer la recherche militaro-industrielle, au détriment du commerce et de la culture.

column2: A cultural and ideological avantgarde within our country has, during the past years, been undertaking a long march through our academic institutions. By steadily working their way up the rungs of the academic ladder, these radical new ideologues are now in a position to completely subvert our academic institutions to better suit their ideological agenda. By supporting their cause, we can increase the speed of our cultural research, to the detriment, however, of other spheres of intellectual progress.
column3: Au sein de notre pays, une avant-garde culturelle et idéologique, au cours des années passées, a entrepris une longue marche dans nos institutions académiques. Après s'être hissé dans les plus hauts rangs, ces nouveaux idéologues radicaux sont désormais en mesure de renverser nos institutions académiques pour mieux asseoir leur programme idéologique. En soutenant leur cause, nous pourrons accélérer notre recherche culturelle, au détriment, cependant, d'autres sphères de progrès intellectuels.

column2: Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.
column3: Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.

column2: Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.
column3: Our nation is strong, our borders inviolate. We shall march into the future together, humbly accepting the knowledge that our nation is the envy of the entire world.

column2: The time has come for our people to stop clinging to ancient tradition. We must look to the nations of the west, and embrace their technology, if we are to retain our independence and our place in the world.
column3: The time has come for our people to stop clinging to ancient tradition. We must look to the nations of the west, and embrace their technology, if we are to retain our independence and our place in the world.

column2: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of equality and social fairness above all else.
column3: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of equality and social fairness above all else.

column2: In our country, all men are created equal. It is time we fully embrace that maxim and throw off the shackles of iniquity.
column3: In our country, all men are created equal. It is time we fully embrace that maxim and throw off the shackles of iniquity.

column2: Ours is a nation where all men are free to do as they wish, to advance their lot in life and achieve the greatness they were born to. This is our highest virtue, and the source of our nation's strength.
column3: Ours is a nation where all men are free to do as they wish, to advance their lot in life and achieve the greatness they were born to. This is our highest virtue, and the source of our nation's strength.

column2: Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.
column3: Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.

column2: Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.
column3: Ours is a great and powerful nation, possessing freedom and strength that other nations can only envy. We shall boldly stride into the future, where our greater destiny awaits.

column2: We will not allow our nation to be overrun by the western imperialists. We are strong, united, and shall remain such. Against all odds, our nation shall endure.
column3: We will not allow our nation to be overrun by the western imperialists. We are strong, united, and shall remain such. Against all odds, our nation shall endure.

column2: Capital and government in our country have, for some time, been doing their utmost to weave between them an intricate web of personal relations, that has increasingly come to assume the forms of a symbiotic relationship of mutual dependence. By further promoting these connections between the public and private spheres of our society, we can vastly increase our technological progress in the fields of industry, at the expense, however of research in other fields.
column3: Depuis quelques temps, notre gouvernement s'est efforcé de tisser autour de lui un vaste réseau de relations qui ont, de plus en plus, pris la forme de relations symboliques de dépendances mutuelles. En poursuivant la promotion de ces relations entre les sphères publiques et privées de notre société, nous pourrons considérablement renforcer notre progression technologique dans les domaines de l'industrie, au détriment d'autres domaines de recherche.

column2: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of liberty and personal freedom above all else.
column3: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of liberty and personal freedom above all else.

column2: Every citizen in our nation exists to serve, towards the greater good. It is only by acting in unison that we can hope to preserve our nation in the perilous times to come.
column3: Every citizen in our nation exists to serve, towards the greater good. It is only by acting in unison that we can hope to preserve our nation in the perilous times to come.

column2: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of force and military power above all else.
column3: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of force and military power above all else.

column2: It has been said that the best way to get ahead in our country is to go via the naval schools. Much of our country's military and political elites have been educated navy men, or have served in the merchant marine. The navy's importance for a seafaring country like our own cannot be underestimated, and by promoting these groups and backgrounds politically, we can ensure that our naval technology will develop at an increased rate, at the expense, however, of other fields of research.
column3: On a souvent dit que le meilleur moyen de progresser dans notre pays consiste à fréquenter les écoles navales. Bon nombre d'élites militaires et politiques de notre pays y ont suivi des études ou ont servi dans la marine marchande. L'importance de la marine pour un pays marin comme le nôtre ne peut être sous-estimée et en assurant la promotion de ces groupes au niveau politique, nous veillerons à ce que notre technologie navale se développe rapidement, au détriment, cependant, d'autres domaines de recherche.

column2: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of law and order above all else.
column3: It is time for our nation to change the character of our people, to encourage them to embrace the values of law and order above all else.

column2: Ours is a wealthy nation filled with industrious, driven people. Each man pushes himself to do better, for the betterment of all.
column3: Ours is a wealthy nation filled with industrious, driven people. Each man pushes himself to do better, for the betterment of all.

column2: Our march towards civilization and matching any imperial nation with our ingenuity continues. We shall not be left behind!
column3: Our march towards civilization and matching any imperial nation with our ingenuity continues. We shall not be left behind!

column2: Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.
column3: Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.

column2: Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.
column3: Our nation is wealthy and our people prosperous. This is and always shall be our greatest strength.

column2: Our culture is astounding. Our military might is unparalleled. Our industry is dazzling. Soon the rest of the world will know of our might, and shake as we step onto the wider stage.
column3: Our culture is astounding. Our military might is unparalleled. Our industry is dazzling. Soon the rest of the world will know of our might, and shake as we step onto the wider stage.

column2: Our country has under the past years come increasingly under the sway of select cliques of people who have all been educated at the same, or similar, elite business schools and companies. By supporting these groups, we can ensure that our academia's focus lies where it matters: in the fields of commerce and industry. This change will, however, come at the expense of other fields of research.
column3: Depuis quelques années, notre pays est sous l'emprise de cliques de personnes qui ont toutes été formées dans les mêmes, ou similaires, écoles commerciales. En soutenant ces groupes, nous pourrons veiller à ce que notre académie se concentre sur ce qui importe : les domaines du commerce et de l'industrie. Cependant, un tel changement s'opérera au détriment d'autres domaines de recherche.
Magnat du capitalisme et écoles commerciales

column2: For too long have we looked to the nations of the west. We reject their ways and their superiority, for our are now and always have been best for us.
column3: For too long have we looked to the nations of the west. We reject their ways and their superiority, for our are now and always have been best for us.

column2: Many within our academic circles feel that the present direction of our academia suffers from an undue bias, and that we should return to a more traditional academic profile.
column3: Nombreux sont les membres des cercles académiques à penser que l'orientation actuelle de notre académie fait l'objet d'injustes préjugés et qu'il serait préférable que nous réadoptions un profil académique plus classique.

column2: We move forward, but as a single people with a singular purpose. We shall not succumb to discord and revolution. Unity is our only hope of greatness.
column3: We move forward, but as a single people with a singular purpose. We shall not succumb to discord and revolution. Unity is our only hope of greatness.

column3: We move forward, but as a single people with a singular purpose. We shall not succumb to discord and revolution. Unity is our only hope of greatness.

column2: 'Natural' cement,namely cement that does not use chemical processes to make the result more durable,began to fall out of use with the production of modern concrete. A veriety of synthetic brands has developed and has resulted in a burgeoning construction industry.
column3: 'Natural' cement,namely cement that does not use chemical processes to make the result more durable,began to fall out of use with the production of modern concrete. A veriety of synthetic brands has developed and has resulted in a burgeoning construction industry.

column3: Un procédé chimique permit de créer différents types de colorants synthétiques. Cela révolutionna la coloration des tissus et mit fin à la production agricole de colorants naturels devenue trop coûteuse.

column2: The development of new, durable synthetic fabrics has opened up a whole new industry to satisfy the demands of clothing manufacturers.
column3: The development of new, durable synthetic fabrics has opened up a whole new industry to satisfy the demands of clothing manufacturers.

column2: Using coal, the synthetic oil factory produces oil out of that coal. Vital for nations that do not have ready access to oil.
column3: L'usine d'huile de synthèse produit de l'huile à partir de charbon. Cette huile de synthèse est vitale pour les nations qui n'ont pas accès au pétrole.

column3: The process of chemically producing rubber, something which has grown in importance due to its involvement in so many industrial processes, will permit us to reduce our reliance on natural sources.

column3: A plant in which artificial rubber is produced, reducing the nation's reliance on natural sources.

column3: The creation of synthetic silk has reduced the reliance of textile factories upon natural sources, as well as reduced the cost of luxury clothing across the world.

column2: With the advent of aircraft, it was not long until the question arose of how they could be used in wartime. At first their primary use was for reconnaissance, but soon thereafter aircraft began to be used to bomb military targets, and to shoot down other aircraft. New ideas and concept had to thus be evolved in order to best utilize this new military weapon.
column3: Avec l'arrivée des avions, il ne fallut pas longtemps avant que la question ne se pose de savoir comment ils pourraient être utilisés en temps de guerre. Au début, leur utilisation primaire a été pour la reconnaissance, mais peu après, des avions ont commencé à être utilisés pour bombarder des cibles militaires, et abattre d'autres avions. De nouvelles idées et le concept devaient donc évoluer afin d'utiliser au mieux cette nouvelle arme militaire.

column2: Japan now controls Formosa, and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.
column3: Japan now controls Formosa, and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.

column2: A tandem-charge weapon is an explosive device or projectile that has two or more stages of detonation. It is effective against cage armor, which is designed to protect an armored vehicle (mostly tanks) against anti-tank munitions. The first stage of the weapon is typically a weak charge that pierces the reactive armor of the target without detonating it, causing little damage to the armor beneath. However, after the reactive armor has been penetrated the location is left more vulnerable, as there then exists a channel through the reactive armor which the HEAT jet of the second warhead may pass unimpeded. The second detonation from the same projectile (which defines it as a tandem charge) attacks the same location as the first detonation where the reactive armor has been compromised. Since the regular armor plating is often the only defense remaining, the tandem charge (second detonation) has an increased likelihood of penetrating the armor.
column3: A tandem-charge weapon is an explosive device or projectile that has two or more stages of detonation. It is effective against cage armor, which is designed to protect an armored vehicle (mostly tanks) against anti-tank munitions. The first stage of the weapon is typically a weak charge that pierces the reactive armor of the target without detonating it, causing little damage to the armor beneath. However, after the reactive armor has been penetrated the location is left more vulnerable, as there then exists a channel through the reactive armor which the HEAT jet of the second warhead may pass unimpeded. The second detonation from the same projectile (which defines it as a tandem charge) attacks the same location as the first detonation where the reactive armor has been compromised. Since the regular armor plating is often the only defense remaining, the tandem charge (second detonation) has an increased likelihood of penetrating the armor.

column2: The first tank, sometimes called barrel, was blessed with mixed success due to the unreliability of these first steel monsters. However, when they worked they could open up the front wherever they went.
column3: Les premiers chars, parfois surnommés "tank", n'ont connu qu'un succès mitigé en raison de leur manque de fiabilité. Cependant, quand ils fonctionnaient, ils pouvaient percer le front en n'importe quel point.

column2: At this point tanks were more reliable and used in smaller units to break holes in the line where stormtroopers and regular infantry could pour in and fight the enemy.
column3: Les chars sont devenus plus fiables et on les utilise en petites unités pour créer des brèches dans lesquelles les troupes d'assaut et l'infanterie régulière peuvent s'engouffrer et combattre l'ennemi.

column2: Experience in the Great War showed the value and usefulness of tanks. However, those that saw action tended to be a bit unwieldy in rough terrain, and not very mobile. Tankettes were the first in a long line of developments in tank technology, that allowed for greater speeds and better maneuverability.
column3: L'expérience de la Grande Guerre a montré la valeur et l'utilité des tanks. Toutefois, ceux qui ont été vus en action tendent à être un peu lourds en terrain accidenté, et pas très mobiles. Les chenillettes ont été les premières d'une longue lignée d'évolution de la technologie des blindés, qui ont permis une plus grande vitesse et une meilleure maniabilité.

column2: The Tanzimat era was a period of reform in the Ottoman Empire, characterized by an increasing drive towards westernization and multiculturalism. This was supported by the Young Ottomans, an intellectual class who saw reform as the only way to prevent the ultimate breakup of a decaying power.
column3: The Tanzimat era was a period of reform in the Ottoman Empire, characterized by an increasing drive towards westernization and multiculturalism. This was supported by the Young Ottomans, an intellectual class who saw reform as the only way to prevent the ultimate breakup of a decaying power.

column2: With an orientation of the Empire towards embracing Arab cultures, and a rejection of the liberal ideals of the Tanzimat Reforms, the Empire has put itself on a path of regaining its role as the preeminent Islamic power. Traditionalists are pleased, and we have seen a widespread acceptance of our aim among Arab groups. While European nations will no doubt seek to interfere, we can at least rest easy knowing that nationalism will not find an easy hold in the Islamic Arab world.
column3: With an orientation of the Empire towards embracing Arab cultures, and a rejection of the liberal ideals of the Tanzimat Reforms, the Empire has put itself on a path of regaining its role as the preeminent Islamic power. Traditionalists are pleased, and we have seen a widespread acceptance of our aim among Arab groups. While European nations will no doubt seek to interfere, we can at least rest easy knowing that nationalism will not find an easy hold in the Islamic Arab world.

column2: The Kanûn-i Esâsî, or 'Basic Law', was a period of constitutional rule in the Empire promoted by the Young Ottomans and intended to serve as a compromise between conservative religious groups and those more interested in reforming the Empire into a modern European democracy.
column3: The Kanûn-i Esâsî, or 'Basic Law', was a period of constitutional rule in the Empire promoted by the Young Ottomans and intended to serve as a compromise between conservative religious groups and those more interested in reforming the Empire into a modern European democracy.

column2: Tanzimat' Turkish for 'reorganization' was a series of reforms enacted by the Ottoman state during the latter half of the 19th century, designed to counteract the rising tides of nationalism among the Empire's vast and varied ethnic minorities. The reforms aimed at integrating the various populations under the common banner of 'Ottomanism', by promoting the Ottoman state as an alternative to the ethnicity based nation states that many of the radicalized minorities within the state were, at the time, seeking to establish, and by granting increased representation and autonomy within the state. While the Tanzimat was ultimately unsuccessful in preventing the decline of the Ottoman state, it can nevertheless be argued that the reforms at least postponed it.
column3: Les réformes de "Tanzimat", le mot turc qui signifie "réorganisation", furent adoptées par l'État ottoman, au cours de la seconde moitié du XIXe siècle, en réaction contre la montée du nationalisme au sein des diverses minorités ethniques de l'empire. Ces réformes visaient à intégrer la population sous la bannière commune d'Ottomanisme en promouvant l'État ottoman comme alternative à l'ethnicité basée sur les États de la nation que bon nombre de minorités radicales, au sein même de l'empire, cherchaient à établir, et en y accordant une représentation et une autonomie plus large. Alors que les réformes de "Tanzimat" ne parvinrent pas à prévenir le déclin de l'État ottoman, force est de constater qu'elles le retardèrent.

column2: With an indication of our alignment towards Europe and a movement away from traditional religious institutions, the Ottoman government has the opportunity to fully enact the ideals of the Young Ottomans and the Tanzimat Reforms. This will endear us towards other European powers and ensure they do not undertake any radical notions of partitioning the Balkans, even if it will ultimately upset more radical Turkish nationalists.
column3: With an indication of our alignment towards Europe and a movement away from traditional religious institutions, the Ottoman government has the opportunity to fully enact the ideals of the Young Ottomans and the Tanzimat Reforms. This will endear us towards other European powers and ensure they do not undertake any radical notions of partitioning the Balkans, even if it will ultimately upset more radical Turkish nationalists.

column3: Il s'agissait des analyses des caractéristiques des unités ennemies, permettant de savoir où tirer et avec quel type de munitions pour obtenir un effet maximal.

column2: Recent reforms to tax laws have increased our tax efficiency. at least until those laws are repealed or loopholes found to evade them.

column2: This area involves the development of railroad from early 19th century horse-and-wagon to the integral rail systems of the early 1920s.
column3: Ce domaine concerne le développement du chemin de fer, des voitures tractées par des chevaux du début du XIXe siècle au réseau ferroviaire intégré du XXe siècle.

column3: Ce domaine concerne le développement interne des entreprises. Les procédures de production et les modes de vente ont changé au fil du temps en accompagnant l'évolution des sciences économiques.

column3: Ce domaine concerne le développement de l'énergie et des moteurs. Notez que chaque amélioration dans ce domaine permet une amélioration de même niveau dans le domaine des technologies industrielles.

column2: The telephone is a major breakthrough in communications technology. Glass and electric gear is needed in this factory.
column3: Le téléphone est une invention déterminante dans le secteur des communications. Du verre et des composants électriques sont nécessaires pour sa production.

column2: The telephone switchboard is a system of electrical components used to connect telephone calls. The first telephone switchboard was invented by Hungarian Tivadar Puskás in 1877 while working for Thomas Edison. Primitive Telephone exchanges were in place for commercial applications by 1881 in the eastern US and western Europe. Telephone exchanges consisted of hundreds of 'plug boards' where a staff of operators manually 'plugged in' calls to route them. Almon Brown Strowger patented the first stepping switch in 1891, which led to automated telephone switching.
column3: Le central téléphonique est un système de composants électriques utilisés pour connecter des appels téléphoniques. Le premier standard téléphonique a été inventé par le hongrois Tivadar Puskás  en 1877 qui travaillait pour Thomas Edison. Des centraux téléphoniques primitifs étaient en place pour des applications commerciales en 1881 à l'est des USA et de l'Europe de l'Ouest. Les centraux téléphoniques consistaient en des centaines de «tableaux de connexions», où un personnel d'opérateurs branchaient manuellement les appels pour les acheminer.Almon Brown Strowger fait breveter le premier commutateur pas à pas, en 1891, qui a conduit à la commutation téléphonique automatisé.

column2: By the use of random violence the public would get to know the evil face of the police state and its blind justice swinging back at the innocents.
column3: La violence aveugle est destinée à forcer le public à ouvrir les yeux sur la face cachée de l'état policier et sur l'aveuglement de sa justice qui frappe les innocents.

column2: A tetrode is an electronic device having four active electrodes. The term most commonly applies to a two-grid vacuum tube. It has the three electrodes of a triode and an additional screen grid which significantly changes its behaviour.
column3: A tetrode is an electronic device having four active electrodes. The term most commonly applies to a two-grid vacuum tube. It has the three electrodes of a triode and an additional screen grid which significantly changes its behaviour.

column2: Greatest of the jewels in our nation's crown is the Indian Raj.
column3: Greatest of the jewels in our nation's crown is the Indian Raj.

column2: Edgardo Mortara was born to Jewish parents in Bologna in 1851. During a period of illness in 1857, a Catholic servant girl of the Mortara family baptized Edgardo, for fear that he might otherwise, as a non-christian, go to Hell if he died. On the basis of this baptism, the Papal States' police took Edgardo away from his family, and had him raised as a Roman Catholic, as non-christians were, according to Papal States' law, forbidden to raise Christian children, even their own. The case, or kidnapping, caused an international uproar, and was protested by, among others, Napoleon III, Emperor Franz Josef and The London Times. Mortara himself would go on to become a Catholic priest, and resumed contact with his siblings and mother in his later life.
column3: Edgardo Mortara est né de parents juifs à Bologne en 1851. En 1857, alors qu'il était malade, une servante catholique de la famille Mortara fit baptiser Edgardo de peur qu'il meure et aille en enfer parce qu'il n'était pas chrétien. Sous prétexte qu'il était baptisé, la police pontificale enleva Edgardo à sa famille et le fit élever comme un catholique, car l'Église interdisait aux non chrétiens d'élever des enfants chrétiens, même les leurs. L'affaire, ou l'enlèvement, devint un scandale international et fit l'objet de protestations de Napoléon III, de l'empereur François-Joseph et du London Times. Mortara fut plus tard ordonné prêtre catholique et ne reprit contact avec ses frères et surs qu'à la fin de sa vie.

column2: The Congo Conference, also known as the 'Berlin Conference', was an international conference held in 1884 at the initiative of German Chancellor Otto Graf von Bismarck. The immediate consequences of the 'General Act' adopted at the conference was a formalization of the rules of engagement for colonial expansion in Africa, and the confirmation of The Congo Free State as the personal property of King Leopold II of Belgium. What will be the outcome this time around? Host The Congo Conference, and let the dice be cast! We should be ready to send invitations to other countries within a few months of enacting this decision.
column3: La Conférence du Congo, également appelée « Conférence de Berlin » est une conférence internationale qui sest tenue en 1884 à linitiative du Chancelier allemand Otto Graf von Bismarck. Les conséquences immédiates de la « déclaration générale » adoptée à la conférence fut la formalisation des règles dengagement pour lexpansion en Afrique et la confirmation de lEtat Libre du Congo en tant que propriété personnelle du roi Léopold II de Belgique. Quelle en sera lissue cette fois-ci ? Accueillez la Conférence du Congo et que les dés soient jetés ! Nous devrions être en mesure denvoyer les invitations aux autres nations quelques mois après avoir entériné la décision.
LAssociation pour la Réforme au Congo

column2: An international humanitarian organization is casting a less than favorable light on our colonial policies in the Congo.
column3: Une organisation humanitaire internationale jette une lumière très défavorable sur notre politique coloniale au Congo.

column2: A common name for Africa prior to its exploration, 'the Dark Continent' referred to the deep interior where few men had ever seen much less knew anything about. These deep jungles and desolate wastes were a no-man's-land, populated primarily by natives who had little contact with civilization. With the increase of exploration brought on by colonialism, suddenly the ability to colonize the areas previously denied us has become possible.
column3: A common name for Africa prior to its exploration, 'the Dark Continent' referred to the deep interior where few men had ever seen much less knew anything about. These deep jungles and desolate wastes were a no-man's-land, populated primarily by natives who had little contact with civilization. With the increase of exploration brought on by colonialism, suddenly the ability to colonize the areas previously denied us has become possible.

column2: The Decline Of The West and The Lost Generation
column3: Le déclin de l'Occident et la génération perdue

column2: The combination of the dramatic social, economic and political transformations undertaken in the nineteenth century with the rise of industry and the devastation produced by mass warfare in the industrial age created a crisis of confidence among many intellectuals that the whole structure of society was under siege and in danger of complete collapse. Oswald Spengler began work on The Decline Of The West in 1911 as the challenges of new social, political and economic forces were shaking advanced industrial societies to their cores, with Spengler concluding that what these societies were experiencing was part of the natural cycle of civilizations that rise, have a period of brilliance, and eventually decline and collapse  a direct challenge to the Victorian idea that modern industrial society could continually be improved as a result of humanitys rational abilities. Coined by American author Gertrude Stein, The Lost Generation captured the sense of loss and emptiness that many veterans of Great War felt after surviving the carnage of the battlefields and questioning the values and beliefs that had encouraged their nations to participate in the conflicts in the first place. These themes of decline and loss that Spengler and Woolf developed would dominate the cultural landscape in the early twentieth century.
column3: La combinaison des dramatiques transformations sociales, économiques et politiques, entreprises au XIXe siècle avec l'essor de l'industrie et les dégâts causés par la guerre de masse à l'ère industrielle, a créé une crise de confiance de nombreux intellectuels « que toute la structure de la société était en état de siège et en danger de s'effondrer complètement ». Oswald Spengler a commencé à travailler sur "le déclin de l'Occident" en 1911 que les défis de nouvelles forces sociales, politiques et économiques ont secoué les sociétés industrielles à leurs curs, avec Spengler de conclure que ces sociétés éprouvées faisaient partie du cycle naturel des civilisations qui se lèvent, avec un délai de brillance, et éventuellement déclinent et s'effondrent - un défi direct à l'idée Victorienne que la société industrielle moderne pourrait être améliorée en permanence en raison des capacités rationnelles de l'humanité. Inventé par l'écrivain américain Gertrude Stein, "The Lost Generation" capture le sentiment de perte et de vide que de nombreux anciens combattants de la Grande Guerre ressentent, après avoir survécu au carnage des champs de bataille et de questionner les valeurs et les croyances qui ont encouragé leurs nations à participer à des conflits pour la première place. Ces thèmes de déclin et de perte que Spengler et Woolf ont développé dominent le paysage culturel du début du XXe siècle.

column2: The spread of revolutionary Communism in the early twentieth century as a potential alternative model to Liberal Capitalism as the basis of the organization of society would lead to the development of new models on the political Right that sought to offer a third alternative that would replace the weaknesses inherent in Liberal Capitalist systems without promoting a social revolution that would dispossess the power and status of the upper and middle classes. By the early 1920s such a model would crystallize in the evolution of Fascism. Although less rigorously defined in terms of ideological content than Communism, Fascism at its base called for the reorganization of The State for the benefit of The Nation as a whole, so that all who are defined as members of the national community, regardless of socioeconomic class, receive the benefits of modern industrial society. This would be achieved by subsuming the desires and concerns of the individual to the needs of the Nation under the leadership of a single party that would govern according to the needs of the Nation as a whole and prepare the Nation to compete successfully with other nations for power and influence in the world. Fully elaborated in the writings of the Italian Giovanni Gentile in the early 1930s, Fascism as an alternative to both Liberal Capitalism and Communism would grow rapidly in the early twentieth century.
column3: La propagation du communisme révolutionnaire au début du 20è siècle comme un potentiel modèle alternatif au capitalisme libéral comme base de l'organisation de la société conduisit au développement de nouveaux modèles pour la droite politique, qui cherche à offrir une troisième alternative pouvant remplacer la faiblesse inhérente dans le système du capitalisme libéral, sans promouvoir une révolution sociale qui risquerait de déposséder la puissance et le statut des hautes et moyennes classes. Au début des années 1920, un tel modèle se cristallise dans l'évolution du fascisme. Cependant moins rigoureusement définit en termes de contenu idéologique que le communisme, le fascisme à sa base appelle à la réorganisation de l'Etat pour le bienfait de la nation comme un tout, de sorte que tout ceux qui sont définis comme membres de la communauté nationale, sans regard aux classes socio-économique, reçoivent les bénéfices de la société industriel moderne. Cet objectif serait atteint en regroupant les désirs et les préoccupations de l'individu dans le besoin de la nation sous la direction d'un parti unique qui gouvernerait en accord avec les besoins de la nation comme un tout et préparerait la nation à rivaliser avec succès contre les autres pour la puissance et l'influence dans le monde. Complétement élaboré par écrit par l'Italien Giovanni Gentile au début des années 1930, le fascisme comme alternative au capitalisme libéral et au communisme grandit rapidement au début du 20è siècle.

column2: In 1868, Pope Piux IX convened the 20th ecumenical council of the Roman Catholic Church. The council was convened to address the perceived problems of the modern ideologies of liberalism, rationalism and materialism, as well as to further define Catholic dogma. While the council was cut short by the capture of Rome by the newly formed Kingdom of Italy, it still left a lasting impression on Catholic theology in the form of the formalized Dogma of Papal Infallibility.
column3: En 1868, le pape Pie IX convoqua le premier concile cuménique du Vatican afin de réfléchir aux problèmes posés par les idéologies modernes que sont le libéralisme, le rationalisme et le matérialisme, ainsi que pour redéfinir le dogme catholique. Interrompu par la prise de Rome par le nouveau royaume d'Italie, ce concile marqua néanmoins durablement la théologie catholique avec le dogme de l'infaillibilité pontificale.

column2: The world is changing rapidly, and bringing with it dangerous new doctines that threaten democratic principle. Whether our nation stands with those who desire freedom, or seeks a different path will be ours to decide and ours alone.
column3: The world is changing rapidly, and bringing with it dangerous new doctines that threaten democratic principle. Whether our nation stands with those who desire freedom, or seeks a different path will be ours to decide and ours alone.

column2: The 'Gründerzeit', 'The Founding Era', refers to a period, stretching roughly from 1840 to the mid 1870s, of rapid economic modernization and industrialization of Germany and eastern Europe in general, and Vienna in particular. The era became know among other things for a its particular style of architecture, inspired by neo-gothic themes and imagery and the new building styles that industrialization had made possible, as well as for the rising tide of political liberalism that came with it. Vienna would, during the era  Support these new trends, and watch Vienna blossom.
column3: Le "Gründerzeit" (époque des fondateurs) désigne une période comprise entre 1840 et le milieu des années 1870 qui se caractérise par la modernisation économique et l'industrialisation rapide de l'Allemagne, de l'Europe de l'est en général, et de Vienne en particulier. Cette période est notamment connue pour son style architectural (inspiré par les thèmes et l'imagerie néogothiques ainsi que par les nouveaux styles de bâtiments que l'industrialisation avait rendu possible) et pour la vague montante de libéralisme politique qui l'accompagna. Soutenez ces nouvelles tendances et assistez à la floraison de Vienne.

column2: The small North Sea island of Heligoland had become a British possession during the Napoleonic Wars, ceded formally by Denmark in the 1814 Treaty of Kiel. After the Unification of Germany the island became an object of desire for The German Empire, as the few inhabitants of the Island were by and large Germans.

Après lunification de lAllemagne, lîle est devenue un objet de convoitise pour l'Empire allemand, les quelques habitants de l'île étant très majoritairement allemands.

column2: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) is an international organization of most of the worlds countries, working to foster global monetary cooperation, secure financial stability, facilitate international trade, promote high employment and sustainable economic growth, and reduce poverty around the world. The organization was formed in 1944 at the Bretton Woods Conference and formally created in 1945 by 29 member countries.

The organization was formed in 1944 at the Bretton Woods Conference and formally created in 1945 by 29 member countries.

column2: The term 'Iron Horse' was used admiringly when comparing early road and railroad traction engines performance to slower, less powerful horse powered tramways. The Iron Horse term became widely popularized and found frequent use in the century and a half following the competition won by George Stephenson's Rocket in innumerable newsprint articles as well as in various novels.
column3: The term 'Iron Horse' was used admiringly when comparing early road and railroad traction engines performance to slower, less powerful horse powered tramways. The Iron Horse term became widely popularized and found frequent use in the century and a half following the competition won by George Stephenson's Rocket in innumerable newsprint articles as well as in various novels.

column2: The Lambert Charter was a document used by France to justify its many attempts at making inroads into, and eventually annex, the independent country and island of Madagascar. The document was signed by crown prince Radama II, who had grown up under the influence of French expatriates on Madagascar, and purported to give France the right to extract minerals and other natural resources from the country, in return for a 10% royalty payable to the Royal House of Madagascar.
column3: La charte Lambert est un document utilisé par la France pour justifier ses nombreuses tentatives de pénétration puis dannexion de lîle de Madagascar, un pays indépendant. Le document fut signé par le roi Radama II, qui avait grandit sous linfluence dexpatriés français à Madagascar, et donnait à la France le droit dexploiter le minerai et autres ressources naturelles du pays en échange dune commission de 10 % payée à la maison royale de Madagascar.

column2: We have the means at our hands to be a nation of power and significance. We must exert that power responsibly, for now we are a true citizen of the world.
column3: We have the means at our hands to be a nation of power and significance. We must exert that power responsibly, for now we are a true citizen of the world.

column2: Japan is traditionally considered to have been founded by Emperor Jimmu in 660 B.C. and while the Imperial Lineage was still considered unbroken since then the Imperial Office had throughout the Edo period	 been reduced to a revered and respected but ultimately	 politically powerless institution. By embracing a restoration of Imperial Rule	 along with a programme of swift industrial modernization constitutionalism and economic freedom Japan might be able to break the fetters placed upon her by the impositions of the Western World.
column3: Selon la tradition, le Japon aurait été fondé par l'empereur Jimmu en 660 avant notre ère et tandis que la lignée impériale était toujours considérée comme ininterrompue, le Bureau impérial avait lui, pendant toute la période Edo, été réduit à une vénérée et respectée institution en définitive politiquement impuissante. Moyennant le rétablissement du règne impérial, ainsi que la mise ne place d'un vaste programme de modernisation industrielle, de constitutionalisme et de liberté économique, le Japon devrait pouvoir rompre les fers que lui a imposé le monde occidental.

column2: The penetration of western influences in Japan has culminated in the overthrow of the feudal system which has governed the islands for hundreds of years, and the restoration of the Emperor to power in Tokyo. A new era of social, political and economic reforms was declared on Wednesday as the Shogun relinquished his power and the Meiji (enlightened rule) era was declared. A bright future surely awaits the land of the rising sun under the new enlightened administration, though some have voiced fears the new Japan could eventually challenge European interests in Asia.
column3: The penetration of western influences in Japan has culminated in the overthrow of the feudal system which has governed the islands for hundreds of years, and the restoration of the Emperor to power in Tokyo. A new era of social, political and economic reforms was declared on Wednesday as the Shogun relinquished his power and the Meiji (enlightened rule) era was declared. A bright future surely awaits the land of the rising sun under the new enlightened administration, though some have voiced fears the new Japan could eventually challenge European interests in Asia.

column2: The penetration of western influences in Japan has culminated in the overthrow of the feudal system and the restoration of the Emperor, as the Meiji (enlightened rule) era was declared. Some have voiced fears that the new Japan could eventually challenge European interests in Asia.
column3: The penetration of western influences in Japan has culminated in the overthrow of the feudal system and the restoration of the Emperor, as the Meiji (enlightened rule) era was declared. Some have voiced fears that the new Japan could eventually challenge European interests in Asia.

column3: Penetration of western influences in Japan has culminated in the overthrow of the feudal system and the restoration of the Emperor in Tokyo, as the Meiji (enlightened rule) era was declared.

column2: Japan is traditionally considered to have been founded by Emperor Jimmu in 660 B.C., and while the Imperial Lineage was still considered unbroken since then, the Imperial Office had, throughout the Edo period, been reduced to a revered and respected but, ultimately, politically powerless institution. By embracing a restoration of Imperial Rule, along with a programme of swift industrial modernization, constitutionalism and economic freedom, Japan might be able to break the fetters placed upon her by the impositions of the Western World.
column3: Selon la tradition, le Japon aurait été fondé par l'empereur Jimmu en 660 avant notre ère et tandis que la lignée impériale était toujours considérée comme ininterrompue, le Bureau impérial avait lui, pendant toute la période Edo, été réduit à une vénérée et respectée institution en définitive politiquement impuissante. Moyennant le rétablissement du règne impérial, ainsi que la mise ne place d'un vaste programme de modernisation industrielle, de constitutionalisme et de liberté économique, le Japon devrait pouvoir rompre les fers que lui a imposé le monde occidental.

column2: The Nancy School was an early French suggestion-centred school of psychotherapy founded by Ambroise-Auguste Liebeault. Whilst its work centred on the application of what they termed 'suggestive therapeutics', they also maintained that hypnosis significantly amplified the efficacy of the suggestions so offered.

column2: The periodic table of the chemical elements is a tabular display of the chemical elements. Although precursors to this table exist, its invention is generally credited to Russian chemist Dmitri Mendeleev, who intended the table to illustrate recorring trends in properties of the elements.
column3: The periodic table of the chemical elements is a tabular display of the chemical elements. Although precursors to this table exist, its invention is generally credited to Russian chemist Dmitri Mendeleev, who intended the table to illustrate recorring trends in properties of the elements.

column2: Why is it you only see a policeman when you don't need one?
column3: Pourquoi ne voit-on le policier que lorsque nous n'en avons pas besoin ?

column2: The move towards the establishment of universal suffrage as the basis for determining the balance of political power in society led to an increased sense of hope that with democracy the issues and concerns of The People would finally be addressed. The resulting factionalism caused by the growth of political parties in wake of universal suffrage soon exposed the limitations of liberal democracy as a system for the arbitration of power in society (especially in times of social, economic or political crisis) and led to a great deal of disenchantment with the ideals of democracy as the best system of governance and a search for potential alternatives to more effectively achieve the promises of a better life for all. Written in 1930 by the Spanish intellectual Jose Ortega y Gasset, The Revolt Of The Masses warns of the potential threat to the ideal of liberal democracy in its current limitations and the potential for the masses to overwhelm the political system and replace it with alternatives that in the end would destroy the basic principles of classic liberal democracy unless liberal democracy was able to reform itself to meet the challenges produced by mass politics.
column3: L'évolution vers l'établissement du suffrage universel comme base pour la détermination de l'équilibre du pouvoir politique dans la société conduit à un sentiment accru d'espoir que la démocratie, les questions et les préoccupations des gens seraient enfin pris en compte. Les factions ainsi créées par la croissance des partis politiques dans le sillage du suffrage universel révélent les limites de la démocratie libérale comme système d'arbitrage du pouvoir dans la société (surtout en période de crise sociale, économique ou politique) et a conduit à un grand désenchantement avec les idéaux de la démocratie comme étant le meilleur système de gouvernance et de recherche de solutions de rechange possibles pour atteindre plus efficacement les promesses d'une vie meilleure pour tous. Rédigé en 1930 par les intellectuels espagnols Jose Ortega y Gasset, "la révolte des masses" met en garde contre la menace potentielle à l'idéal de la démocratie libérale dans ses limites actuelles et le potentiel pour les masses de submerger le système politique et de le remplacer par des alternatives qui à la fin, serait de détruire les principes fondamentaux de la démocratie libérale classique à moins que la démocratie libérale réussisse à se réformer pour répondre aux défis produits par la politique de masse.

column2: During Napoleon's redrawings of the European map, the left bank of the river Rhine had been annexed to France proper. In 1840 France's Prime Minister Adolphe Thiers publicly stated that, in his opinion, the Rhine still remained France's natural eastern border. With the hardships of the Napoleonic wars still in living memory the statement caused uproar in Germany, sparking what would become known as 'The Rhine Crisis'
column3: Lorsque Napoléon redessina la carte de l'Europe, la rive gauche du Rhin fut annexée par la France. En 1840, le Premier ministre Adolphe Thiers affirma publiquement, quà son avis, le Rhin demeurait la frontière orientale naturelle de la France. Le souvenir des temps difficiles des guerres napoléoniennes encore présent dans les mémoire fit que cette déclaration leva un tollé de protestations en Allemagne, donnant naissance à ce qui serait connu sous le nom de « Crise du Rhin ».

column2: A recognition has begun among our people of the basic fundamental rights that all humanity shares. This is the first step in becoming a truly modern civilization.
column3: A recognition has begun among our people of the basic fundamental rights that all humanity shares. This is the first step in becoming a truly modern civilization.

column2: The Ruhr area, formerly parts of the counties of Berg, Mark and Cleves, is changing day by day. Every day new coal pits, mines and shafts are opened up to supply the ever expanding Prussian railway networks, and lately, supported by imports of British industrial technology, factories are springing up like mushrooms after an autumn rain. The Ruhr is booming, and the example could easily spread to the rest of Germany, if only it were given a little nudge out the door.
column3: La région de la Ruhr, autrefois répartie entre les contés de Berg, Mark et Cleves, se transforme chaque jour un peu plus. Chaque jour, de nouveaux puits de charbon sont ouverts pour répondre à la demande du réseau de chemin de fer prussien en expansion constante. Plus tard, soutenu par limportation de la technologie industrielle britannique, les usines pousseront comme des champignons après la pluie. La Ruhr est en expansion et son exemple pourrait se généraliser à lAllemagne entière sil recevait un petit coup de pouce.
Encourager le boom de la Ruhr

column2: The San Francisco System is a term used to describe Japan's relationship with the United States and its role in the international arena as determined by the Treaty of San Francisco and the Security Treaty Between the United States and Japan, as well as later treaties such as the Treaty of Mutual Cooperation and Security between the United States and Japan. As long as the San Francisco System remains in place, Japan is heavily dependent on the United States Armed Forces.
column3: The San Francisco System is a term used to describe Japan's relationship with the United States and its role in the international arena as determined by the Treaty of San Francisco and the Security Treaty Between the United States and Japan, as well as later treaties such as the Treaty of Mutual Cooperation and Security between the United States and Japan. As long as the San Francisco System remains in place, Japan is heavily dependent on the United States Armed Forces.

column2: The Metropolitan Police, incorporated by the Metropolitan Police Act of 1829, became known informally during the Victorian era as 'The Scotland Yard' after its headquarters at 4 Whitehall Palace, the site of an earlier road called 'The Great Scotland Yard'. One of the most iconic police services of the era, mentioned in works by, among others, Jules Verne and Arthur Conan Doyle, the Yard could certainly help us solve a crime or two.
column3: Sous l'ère victorienne, la police métropolitaine, incorporée par le Metropolitan Police Act de 1829, fut surnommée "Scotland Yard" suite à l'installation de ses bureaux au 4 Whitehall Palace à l'emplacement d'une ancienne route appelée "The Great Scotland Yard". Cité dans des uvres de Jules Verne et d'Arthur Conan Doyle, entre autres, Scotland Yard fut l'un des services de police les plus légendaires de son époque. Il pourrait certainement nous aider à élucider un ou deux crimes.

column2: The first thing people see as they approach New York harbor, by boat from the Old World, is the gleaming tip of an enormous torch, symbolizing the freedom and liberty of the New. For many of the immigrants to our great nation, this will be the lasting first impression of a country forged and born in liberty, and of a new home.
column3: La première chose que les gens arrivant par bateau du vieux monde voient, lorqu'ils approchent le port de New-York, c'est la pointe brillante d'une énorme torche, symbolisant la libertée du nouveau monde. Pour beaucoup d'immigrants, ce sera la première impression marquante qu'ils auront de leur nouvelle maison

column2: The development of the cinema in the late nineteenth and early twentieth century would result in the creation of a new mass cultural activity that would soon become one of the hallmarks of the era. The power and influence of the cinema would be further enhanced when in the 1920s technological improvements allowed for the ability of sounds to be synchronized with the moving images so that not just the visual representation of a scene could be represented on screen, but its aural component as well. The Jazz Singer, released in the United States in 1927, was the first sound motion picture, and within half a decade the silent movie had become a relic of the past, and a new, powerful medium had entered the public sphere, forever changing not only popular culture, but the nature of politics and international relations as well
column3: Le développement du cinéma, fin du XIXe siècle et début XXe, s'est traduit par la création d'une nouvelle activité culturelle de masse qui est bientôt devenue l'une des caractéristiques de l'époque. Le pouvoir et l'influence du cinéma seraient encore renforcés dans les années 20 lorsque des améliorations technologiques permirent d'avoir des sons synchronisés avec les images en mouvement de sorte que non seulement la représentation visuelle d'une scène pouvait être montrée à l'écran, mais sa composante sonore aussi. « Le chanteur de jazz », sorti aux États-Unis en 1927, a été le premier film sonorisé, et en une demi-décennie, le cinéma muet était devenu une relique du passé, et un nouveau moyen puissant était entré dans la sphère publique, changeant non seulement la culture populaire, mais aussi la nature de la politique et les relations internationales.

column2: in 1878-80 Adolf Erik Nordenskiöld, with financial support from King Oscar II, became the first person to successfully circumnavigate the whole of the Eurasian landmass with his Vega Expedition. While the existence of the Northeast Passage had been confirmed since at least the middle of the century, Nordenskiöld was the first to actually navigate the passage, and his return to Stockholm in 1880 was widely celebrated.
column3: En 1878-80 Adolf Erik Nordenskiöld, avec le soutien financier du roi Oscar II, est devenu le premier navigateur à faire le tour de lensemble continental euro-asiatique lors de son expédition Vega. Lexistence du passage du nord-est était confirmée depuis la moitié du XIXe siècle, mais Nordenskiöld fut le premier à lemprunter. Son retour à Stockholm en 1880 fut largement fêté.

column2: 'The White Man's Burden' was a poem by the English poet Rudyard Kipling, published in 1899. At face value it appeared to be a rhetorical command to white men to colonise and rule other nations for the benefit of those people (both the people and the duty may be seen as representing the 'burden' of the title), even though it mixed its  exhortation to empire with somber warnings of the costs involved in imperialism. Imperialists came to understand the phrase 'white man's burden' as a characterization for imperialism that justified the policy as a noble enterprise.
column3: 'The White Man's Burden' was a poem by the English poet Rudyard Kipling, published in 1899. Imperialists came to understand the phrase 'white man's burden' as a characterization for imperialism that justified the policy as a noble enterprise.

He built upon earlier work by broadening associationism to consider it as an active process of an active mind. This active process considered the effects of other associations, temperament and state of mind of the individual, the state of health of the body, as well as the circumstances of the moment.

column2: Thorstein Veblen is to economics what Jonathan Swift is to English literature: a master of the art of satire. It is essential to effective satire that its message be ambiguous: the reader should never be sure whether the author is absolutely serious or just pulling his or her leg. That quality is certainly present in Swift's Gulliver's Travels and it is also present in Veblen's Theory of the Leisure Class (1899), The Instinct of Workmanship (1914), Imperial Germany and the Industrial Revolution (1915), The Higher Learning in America (1918), Absentee Ownership (1923), and his many essays. In fact, it is there in everything he wrote except The Theory of Business Enterprise (1904), which is as near as he ever came to writing a conventional academic book. No matter which of these books we open, we find the idea that life in a modern industrial community is the result of a polar conflict between 'pecuniary employments' and 'industrial employments', between 'business enterprise' and 'the machine process', between 'vendibility' and 'serviceability'-in short, between making money and making goods. There is a class struggle under capitalism, not between the bourgeoisie and the proletariat, but between businessmen and engineers. Pecuniary habits of thought unite bankers, brokers, lawyers and managers in a defence of private acquisition
column3: Thorstein Veblen est à l'économie ce que Jonathan Swift est à la littérature anglaise: un maître dans l'art de la satire. Il est aussi indispensable à l'efficacité de la satire que son message est ambigu: le lecteur ne devait jamais être sûr que l'auteur soit tout à fait sérieux ou tout simplement traîté par dessus la jambe qui est la qualité certainement présente dans 'les Voyages de Gulliver' de Swift et également présente dans la théorie de Veblen de la Leisure Class (1899), L'Instinct de qualité d'exécution (1914), l'Allemagne impériale et la révolution industrielle (1915), L'apprentissage supérieur en Amérique (1918),L' absence de propriétaires (1923), et ses nombreux essais. En fait, elle est là dans tout ce qu'il a écrit, sauf La théorie des affaires des entreprises (1904), qui est plus proche de l'écriture d'un livre classique académique. Peu importe lequels de ces livres nous ouvrons, nous trouverons l'idée que la vie dans une communauté industrielle moderne est le résultat d'un conflit entre 2 pôles 'emplois pécuniers' et 'emplois industriels', entre 'affaires d'entreprises' et 'le processus de la machine', entre 'attrait de la vente' et 'capacité de service', bref, entre faire de l'argent et fabriquer des biens. Il y a une lutte des classes sous le capitalisme, non pas entre bourgeoisie et prolétariat, mais entre hommes d'affaires et ingénieurs. Les habitudes de pensée pécuniaire unissent banquiers, courtiers, avocats et gestionnaires dans une défense de l'acquisition privée.

column2: The Old Summer Palace, known in Chinese as the Gardens of Perfect Brightness, was a complex of gardens northwest of the Imperial City in Beijing, China. The gardens were built in the 18th and early 19th centuries, and functioned as a place of residence for the Qing Emperors. The Old Summer Palace was burnt to the ground by Anglo-French forces during their occupation of Beijing during the Second Opium War. While the torching was a major blow to Chinese morale, it was also decried by many European intellectuals, Victor Hugo among others, as a criminal act of brutality directed against the Chinese. By burning this exquisite piece of Chinese cultural history, we can inflict a massive blow on Chinese morale.
column3: L'ancien Palais d'été, connu en chinois sous le nom des Jardin de l'intelligence parfaite, abritait un vaste parc situé au nord-est de la Cité impériale de Pékin, en Chine. Ce parc fut créé entre le XVIIIe et le début du XIXe siècle et son palais servait de résidence aux empereurs Qing. L'ancien Palais d'été a été brûlé par des troupes anglo-françaises lors de l'occupation de Pékin de la seconde guerre de l'opium. Bien qu'un tel agissement porta un coup sérieux au moral des Chinois, il fut décrié par bon nombre d'intellectuels européens, tels que Victor Hugo, comme un acte criminel dirigé contre les Chinois. En brûlant ce chef-d'uvre de l'histoire culturelle chinoise, nous porterons un coup sérieux au moral des Chinois.

column2: The torpedo is a self-propelled weapon with an explosive warhead, launched above or below the water surface, propelled underwater towards a target, and designed to detonate either on contact with its target or in proximity to it. column3: La torpille est une arme automotrice avec une ogive explosive, lancée au-dessus ou au-dessous de la surface de l'eau, propulsée vers une cible, et destiné à exploser, soit au contact de la cible ou à proximité. Lancé à partir d'un petit bateau, elle peut être mortelle même pour les plus grands navires de guerre.

column2: A triode is an electronic amplification device having three active electrodes. The term most commonly applies to a vacuum tube (or valve in British English) with three elements: the filament or cathode, the grid, and the plate or anode. The triode vacuum tube was the first electronic amplification device, which propelled the electronics age forward,  by enabling amplified radio technology and long-distance telephony.

column2: Up until this era, farmers planted the seeds for cereal crops by carrying the seeds in a bag and walking up and down the field throwing or broadcasting the seed. They broadcast the seed by hand on to the ploughed and harrowed ground. The problem with this method was that it did not give a very even distribution. It was not, therefore, an efficient use of the seed and much of it was wasted. Jethro Tull invented a Seed Drill which could be pulled behind a horse. It consisted of a wheeled vehicle containing a box filled with grain. There was a wheel-driven ratchet that sprayed the seed out evenly as the Seed Drill was pulled across the field.
column3: Jusqu'à cette époque, les agriculteurs ont planté les graines pour les cultures céréalières en portant les graines dans un sac et en parcourant les champs, lançant les semis à la volée. Ils diffusent les graines à la main sur la labouré et hersées sol. Le problème avec cette méthode est qu'elle ne donne pas une distribution très homogène. Ce n'était pas, par conséquent, une utilisation efficace des graine et une grande partie étaient perdue. Jethro Tull a inventé un semoir qui pourrait être tiré par un cheval. Il se composait d'un véhicule à roues contenant une boîte remplie de grain. Il y avait une roue à rochet mécanique qui pulvérise la semence uniformément tandis que le semoir été tiré sur le champ.

column2: With new turbines added to trawlers across the country, who needs actual fishermen?
column3: With new turbines added to trawlers across the country, who needs actual fishermen?

column2: Championed by the 'Young Turks', Turkish Nationalism because an ideology across the Ottoman Empire which promoted and glorified the Turkish people, and which sought to put the interests of the state over other influences-- even religious ones.
column3: Championed by the 'Young Turks', Turkish Nationalism because an ideology across the Ottoman Empire which promoted and glorified the Turkish people, and which sought to put the interests of the state over other influences-- even religious ones.

column2: Turkish Nationalists seek to topple the Ottoman monarchy, replacing it with a liberal republic.
column3: Turkish Nationalists seek to topple the Ottoman monarchy, replacing it with a liberal republic.

column2: Technology - Here you control research of new technologies, each technology you research will help you with some aspect of your struggle for domination.
column3: Technologie : cet écran vous permet de contrôler la recherche de nouvelles technologies. Chaque technologie mise au point contribue par certains aspects à votre lutte pour la domination.

column2: Politics - One of the cornerstones of Victoria 2. Through the political system you guide your nation by setting reforms and supporting political parties. Just beware that your policies might upset various interest groups in your society.
column3: Politique : la politique est un des fondements de Victoria 2. Le système politique vous permet de guider votre nation en engageant des réformes et en soutenant des partis politiques. Veillez à ce que vos politiques ne froissent pas certains groupes d'intérêt de votre société.

column2: Population - Your population, the people that live in your country, is a major concern in Victoria 2. Many of your decisions will be made with your population in mind, and most will have consequences for your population, maybe today or maybe in several years.
column3: Population : la population de votre pays joue un rôle prépondérant dans Victoria 2. Vous prendrez généralement vos décisions en pensant à votre population, et la plupart auront des conséquences sur elle, aujourd'hui ou dans plusieurs années.

column2: Trade - The goods that are produced by the industrial (and pre-industrial) society must be exchanged for money, this is done via the Trade Screen. Trade in Victoria 2 will go on without your interference but you need to buy goods to supply your government and also monitor the market for possible effects of your country.
column3: Commerce : les marchandises produites par la société industrielle (et préindustrielle) doivent être échangées contre de l'argent, et ce, grâce au commerce. Dans Victoria 2, vous n'intervenez pas dans le commerce, mais vous devez acheter des marchandises pour approvisionner votre gouvernement et surveiller le marché en vue de possibles effets sur votre pays.

column2: Diplomacy - Another pillar of Victoria 2 is diplomacy. The making of alliances jousting for control over lesser nation is an essential part gaining the upper hand in the world.
column3: Diplomatie : la diplomatie est un autre pilier de Victoria 2. L'établissement d'alliances en vue de contrôler une plus petite nation est un aspect essentiel pour se positionner parmi les pays les plus puissants du monde.

column2: Military - Finally, the Art of War. The world of politics and diplomacy can only take you so far before you must let the cannons speak.
column3: Armée : passons enfin à l'art de la guerre. La politique et la diplomatie s'arrêtent là où les canons entrent en action.

column2: Most of the action takes place on the World Map, here you can see countries, buildings and troops. You can a scroll the map by moving your mouse to the edge of the world, and you can zoom by using the mouse wheel. Try this for a bit then click next.
column3: L'action se déroule principalement sur la carte du monde où sont représentés les pays, les bâtiments et les troupes. Pour faire défiler la carte, déplacez la souris vers le bord du monde et pour effectuer un zoom, utilisez la molette de la souris. Essayez, puis cliquez sur Suivant.

column2: Most of the action takes place on the World Map, here you can see countries, buildings and troops. You can a scroll the map by moving your mouse to the edge of the world, and you can zoom by using the mouse wheel. Try this for a bit then click next.
column3: L'action se déroule principalement sur la carte du monde où sont représentés les pays, les bâtiments et les troupes. Pour faire défiler la carte, déplacez la souris vers le bord du monde et pour effectuer un zoom, utilisez la molette de la souris. Essayez, puis cliquez sur Suivant.

column2: This is an introduction to Victoria 2, a Grand Strategy Game mainly set in the 19th Century. This was the era when the modern world was born, old empires died and new ones rose to power, new technologies revolutionized the way people and nations lived, new ideologies ripped nations apart or forged them stronger then ever before and all this was powered by the massive Industrial Revolution.\nSo where do you come into all this? Click next to find out.
column3: Victoria 2 est un grand jeu de stratégie dont l'action se déroule principalement au XIXe siècle. Nous sommes au début de l'ère moderne, les empires ont cédé la place à de nouvelles puissances, de nouvelles technologies ont révolutionné la vie des gens et des nations, de nouvelles idéologies ont déchiré des nations et en ont renforcé d'autres, tout cela sous l'impulsion de la révolution industrielle.\nAlors, où intervenez-vous dans ce contexte ? Pour en savoir plus, cliquez sur Suivant.

column2: You can navigate easier in the world by using the mini-map, just click anywhere on it to jump to where you are going. There is also a Find Province or Country function available that helps you find where you want to go, use this now to get back to Belgium.
column3: Pour naviguer plus facilement dans le monde, utilisez la minicarte. Cliquez n'importe où sur la minicarte pour accéder à l'emplacement de votre choix. Une fonction de recherche de province ou de pays est également disponible pour vous aider à vous repérer. Utilisez-la pour revenir en Belgique.

column2: To help you understand the world we live in there are a number of map modes that change the appearance of the map. We are currently in the Terrain Map Mode, we can swap to Political Map Mode to better see which provinces are controlled by which nations. Do this.
column3: Pour vous aider à comprendre le monde dans lequel vous vivez, plusieurs modes d'affichage de la carte sont disponibles. Vous êtes actuellement en mode Carte géographique, mais vous pouvez passer en mode Carte politique pour savoir quelles nations contrôlent telle ou telle province. Allez-y.

column2: The game is currently paused. When the game is paused you can issue orders and interact with all aspects of the game, when you are done issuing orders you can unpause the game and things will start to happen.
column3: Vous êtes actuellement en mode Pause, mode vous permettant de donner des ordres et d'intervenir sur tous les aspects du jeu. Lorsque vous quittez le mode Pause pour reprendre le jeu, les événements commencent à se produire.

column2: You can see that the current date is January 1st, 1836. Next to the date you see a pause symbol and a plus and minus sign. By clicking the pause symbol you can start time passing and by using the + and - sign you can increase or decrease how fast time moves. Its also important to know that you can pause and unpause by clicking Space. Try unpausing the game now.
column3: Nous sommes le 1er janvier 1836. Près de la date se trouve le symbole Pause ainsi qu'un signe plus et moins. Cliquez sur le symbole Pause pour que le temps s'écoule à nouveau et utilisez les signes + et - pour augmenter ou réduire la vitesse d'écoulement du temps. Vous pouvez également utiliser la touche espace de votre clavier pour mettre le jeu en pause et le relancer. Essayez de quitter le mode Pause pour reprendre le jeu.
Des événements se produisent dans le monde entier.

column2: There are going to be a lot of things going on in the world. Some things influence you and some do not. There are different ways to find out what goes on:
column3: Parmi ces événements, certains ont une influence sur vous et d'autres pas. Il existe différents moyens de savoir ce qui se passe :

column2: Popups - These are large intrusive messages in the center of the screen, this should be important stuff.
column3: Popups : il s'agit de grands messages importants qui apparaissent au centre de l'écran.

column2: Message Icons - Here can messages be displayed that might be important to you but does not always require your immediate attention.
column3: Icônes de message : messages potentiellement importants mais ne nécessitant pas toujours votre attention immédiate.

column2: Message Log - Here you can read things that are less important, but still interesting.
column3: Journal des messages : autres messages, pas aussi importants mais néanmoins intéressants.

column2: Diplomatic Icons - These are important. Here are all the diplomatic suggestions you get from other nations. To find out more and take action, you left click, if you just want to dismiss them out of hand, right-click on them.
column3: Icônes diplomatiques : il s'agit de toutes les propositions diplomatiques importantes que vous recevez des autres nations. Pour en savoir plus et intervenir, faites un clic gauche. Pour les ignorer, faites un clic droit.

column2: Except for the diplomatic icons, you can change how different messages behave. Maybe you think that a ruler change in another nation deserves a popup. You can do this by just rick-clicking on them or changing their behavior under the settings menu.
column3: Hormis les icônes diplomatiques, vous pouvez modifier le type d'affichage des différents messages. Peut-être estimez-vous qu'un changement de dirigeant dans une autre nation mérite un popup. Pour ce faire, faites un clic droit ou apportez vos modifications sous le menu des paramètres.

column2: It appears the Netherlands has declared war on us, we must deal with this. Click next to continue.
column3: Apparemment, la Belgique vous a déclaré la guerre. Vous devez réagir. Cliquez sur Suivant pour continuer.
